GS39kamasutu:112_0: 1.2.32 /.na kāmāṃś caret / dharma^arthayoḥ pradhānayor evam anyeṣāṃ ca satāṃ pratyanīkatvāt /

GS39kamasutu:116: 1.2.36/.devarājaś ca^ahalyām atibalaś ca kīcako draupadīṃ rāvaṇaś ca sītām apare ca^anye ca bahavo dṛśyante kāmavaśagā vinaṣṭā ity artha^cintakāḥ//(p.24)

GS39kamasutu:133: 1.3.7/.asti vyākaraṇam ity avaiyākaraṇā api yājñikā ūhaṃ kratuṣu prayuñjate//(p.29)

GS39kamasutu:288: 1.5.2/.tad^viparīta uttama^varṇāsu para^parigṛhītāsu ca/ pratiṣiddho +avara^varṇāsv aniravasitāsu/ veśyāsu punarbhūṣu ca na śiṣṭo na pratiṣiddhaḥ/ sukha^arthatvāt//(p.61)

GS39kamasutu:294: 1.5.8/.patiṃ vā mahāntam īśvaram asmad^amitra^saṃsṛṣṭam iyam avagṛhya prabhutvena carati/ sā mayā saṃsṛṣṭā snehād enaṃ vyāvartayiṣyati//(p.64)
GS39kamasutu:295: 1.5.9/.virasaṃ vā mayi śaktam apakartukāmaṃ ca prakṛtim āpādayiṣyati//(p.64)

GS39kamasutu:297: 1.5.11/.saṃsṛṣṭo vā^anayā hatvā^asyāḥ patim asmadbhāvyaṃ tad aiśvaryam evam adhigamiṣyāmi//(p.65)

GS39kamasutu:299: 1.5.13/.marmajñā vā mayi dṛdham abhikāmā sā mām anicchantaṃ doṣa^vikhyāpānena dūṣayiṣyati//(p.65)
GS39kamasutu:300: 1.5.14/.asad^bhūtaṃ vā doṣaṃ śraddheyaṃ duṣparihāraṃ mayi kṣepsyati yena me vināśaḥ syāt//(p.66)

GS39kamasutu:302: 1.5.16/.svayaṃ vā taiḥ saha saṃsṛjyeta/ madavarodhānāṃ vā dūṣayitā patir asyās tad asyāham api dārān eva dūṣayan pratikariṣyāmi//(p.66)

GS39kamasutu:476: 2.4.4/.tad^ācchuritakam ardhacandro maṇḍalaṃ rekhā vyāghra^nakhaṃ mayūra^padakaṃ śaśa^plutakam utpala^patrakam iti rūpato +aṣṭa^vikalpam//(p.117)

GS39kamasutu:626: 2.7.7/.amvārthāḥ śabdā vāraṇa^arthā mokṣaṇa^arthāś cālam arthās te te ca^artha^yogāt//(p.148)

GS39kamasutu:672: 2.8.6/.sā prakīryamāṇa^keśa^kusumā śvāsa^vicchinna^hāsinī vaktra^saṃsarga^arthaṃ stanābhyām uraḥ pīḍayantī punaḥ punaḥ śiro nāmayantī yāś ceṣṭāḥ pūrvam *aṃsau[ch:
GS39kamasutu:673_0: asau] darśitavāṃs tā eva pratikurvīta / pātitā pratipātayāmi^iti / hasantī tarjayantī
GS39kamasutu:673_1: pratighnatī ca brūyāt / punaś ca vrīḍāṃ darśayet / śramaṃ virāma^abhīpsāṃ ca / puruṣopasṛptair
GS39kamasutu:675: 2.8.8/.puruṣaḥ śayanasthāyā yoṣitas tad vacana^vyākṣipta^cittāyā iva nīvīṃ viśleṣayet/ tatra vivadamānāṃ kapola^cumbanena paryākulayet/

GS39kamasutu:717: 2.9.4/.sā tato ratim ābhimānikīṃ vṛttiṃ ca lipset/

GS39kamasutu:774_0: 2.10.1 /.nāgarakaḥ saha mitrajanena paricārakaiś ca kṛta^puṣpa^upahāre saṃcārita^surabhi^dhūpe
GS39kamasutu:774_1: raty^āvāse prasādhite vāsa^gṛhe kṛta^snāna^prasādhanāṃ yuktyā pītāṃ striyaṃ sāntvanaiḥ

GS39kamasutu:781_0: 2.10.6 /.rata^avasānikaṃ rāgam ativāhya^asaṃstutayor iva savrīḍayoḥ parasparam apaśyatoḥ

GS39kamasutu:781_2: tāmbūla^grahaṇam acchīkṛtaṃ candanam anyad vā^anulepanaṃ tasyā gātre svayam eva niveśayet /

GS39kamasutu:783_1: śuṣka^māṃsaṃ mātuluṅga^cukrakāṇi saśarkarāṇi ca yathā^deśa^sātmyaṃ ca / tatra madhuram
GS39kamasutu:783_2: idaṃ mṛdu viśadam iti ca vidaśya vidaśya tat tad upāharet /
GS39kamasutu:784_1: kathābhir anuvarteta / tad^aṅka^saṃlīnāyāś candramasaṃ paśyantyā nakṣatra^paṅkti^vyaktī^karaṇam /
GS39kamasutu:791: 2.10.13a/.ādye saṃdarśane jāte pūrvaṃ ye syur manorathāḥ/(p.181)
GS39kamasutu:794: 2.10.13d/.tais taiś ca bhāvaiḥ saṃyukto yūno rāgo vivardhate//(p.181)
GS39kamasutu:795: 2.10.14/.rāgavad āhāryarāgaṃ kṛtrimarāgaṃ vyavahitarāgaṃ poṭārataṃ khalaratam ayantritaratam iti rataviśeṣāḥ//(p.182)
GS39kamasutu:796: 2.10.15/.saṃdarśanāt prabhṛty ubhayor api pravṛddha^rāgayoḥ prayatna^kṛte samāgame pravāsa^pratyāgamane vā kalaha^viyoga^yoge tad^rāgavat//(p.182)
GS39kamasutu:799: 2.10.18/.tatra cātuḥṣaṣṭikair yogaiḥ sātmya^anuviddhaiḥ saṃdhukṣya saṃdhukṣya rāgaṃ pravarteta/
GS39kamasutu:802: 2.10.21/.puruṣas tu hṛdaya^priyām anyāṃ manasi nidhāya vyavaharet/ saṃprayogāt prabhṛti ratiṃ yāvat/ atas tad^vyavahitarāgam//(p.183)
GS39kamasutu:803: 2.10.22/.nyūnāyāṃ kumbha^dāsyāṃ paricārikāyāṃ vā yāvad arthaṃ saṃprayogas tat^poṭāratam//(p.184)
GS39kamasutu:805: 2.10.24/.tathā veśyāyā grāmīṇena saha yāvad arthaṃ khalaratam//(p.184)
GS39kamasutu:808: 2.10.27/.vardhamāna^praṇayā tu nāyikā sapatnīnām agrahaṇaṃ tad^āśrayam ālāpaṃ vā gotra^skhalitaṃ vā na marṣayet/ nāyaka^vyalīkaṃ ca//(p.185)
GS39kamasutu:809: 2.10.28/.tatra subhṛśaḥ kalaho ruditam āyāsaḥ śiro^ruhāṇām avakṣodanaṃ prahaṇanam āsanāc chayanād vā mahyāṃ patanaṃ mālya^bhūṣaṇa^avamokṣo bhūmau śayyā ca//(p.185)
GS39kamasutu:810: 2.10.29/.tatra yukta^rūpeṇa sāmnā pāda^patanena vā prasanna^manās tām anunayann upakramya śayanam ārohayet//(p.185)
GS39kamasutu:811_0: 2.10.30 /.tasya ca vacanam uttareṇa yojayantī vivṛddha^krodhā sakaca^graham asya^āsyam
GS39kamasutu:811_1: unnamayya pādena bāhau śirosi vakṣasi pṛṣṭhe vā sakṛd dvis trir avahanyāt / dvāra^deśaṃ
GS39kamasutu:812_0: 2.10.31 /.atikruddhā^api tu na dvāra^deśād bhūyo gacchet / doṣavattvāt / iti dattakaḥ /
GS39kamasutu:812_1: tatra yuktito +anunīyamānā prasādam ākāṅkṣet / prasannā^api tu sakaṣāyair eva vākyair
GS39kamasutu:813: 2.10.32/.svabhavanasthā tu nimittāt kalahitā tathā^vidha^ceṣṭā^eva nāyakam abhigacchet/ (p.186)
GS39kamasutu:814: 2.10.33/.tatra pīṭhamarda^viṭa^vidūṣakair nāyaka^prayuktair upaśamita^roṣā tair eva^anunītā taiḥ saha^eva tad^bhavanam adhigacchet/ tatra ca vaset/ iti praṇayakalahaḥ//(p.187)
GS39kamasutu:830: 3.1.1/.savarṇāyām ananyapūrvāyāṃ śāstrato +adhigatāyāṃ dharmo +arthaḥ putrāḥ saṃbandhaḥ pakṣavṛddhir anupaskṛtā ratiś ca//(p.190)
GS39kamasutu:831_0: 3.1.2 /.tasmāt kanyām abhijana^upetāṃ mātā^pitṛ^matīṃ tri^varṣāt prabhṛti nyūna^vayasaṃ
GS39kamasutu:831_1: ślāghya^ācāre dhanavati pakṣavati kule saṃbandhi^priye saṃbandhibhir ākule prasūtāṃ
GS39kamasutu:833: 3.1.3/.yāṃ gṛhītvā kṛtinam ātmānaṃ manyeta na ca samānair nindyeta tasyāṃ pravṛttir iti ghoṭakamukhaḥ//(p.191)
GS39kamasutu:834: 3.1.4/.tasyā varaṇe mātā^pitarau saṃbandhinaś ca prayateran/ mitrāṇi ca gṛhīta^vākyāny ubhaya^saṃbaddhāni//(p.191)
GS39kamasutu:835_0: 3.1.5 /.tāny anyeṣāṃ varayitṝṇāṃ doṣān pratyakṣa^anāgamikāṃś ca śrāvayeyuḥ / kaulān
GS39kamasutu:835_1: pauruṣeyān abhiprāya^saṃvardhakāṃś ca nāyakaguṇān / viśeṣataś ca kanyāmātur anukūlāṃs
GS39kamasutu:836: 3.1.6/.daiva^cintaka^rūpaś ca śakuna^nimitta^graha^lagna^bala^lakṣaṇa^darśanena nāyakasya bhaviṣyantam artha^saṃyogaṃ kalyāṇam anuvarṇayet//(p.192)
GS39kamasutu:837: 3.1.7/.apare punar asya^anyato viśiṣṭena kanyālābhena kanyāmātaram unmādayeyuḥ//(p.193)
GS39kamasutu:841: 3.1.11/.apraśasta^nāmadheyāṃ ca guptāṃ dattāṃ ghonāṃ pṛṣatām ṛṣabhāṃ vinatāṃ vikaṭāṃ vimuṇḍāṃ śuci^dūṣitāṃ sāṃkarikīṃ rākāṃ phalīnīṃ mitrāṃ svanujām varṣakarīṃ ca varjayet//(p.193)
GS39kamasutu:844: 3.1.13/.yasyāṃ manaś^cakṣuṣor nibandhas tasyām ṛddhiḥ/ na^itarām ādriyeta/ ity eke//(p.194)
GS39kamasutu:845_0: 3.1.14 /.tasmāt pradāna^samaye kanyām udāra^veṣāṃ sthāpayeyuḥ / aparāhṇikaṃ ca nityaṃ
GS39kamasutu:845_1: prasādhitāyāḥ sakhībhiḥ saha krīḍā / yajña^vivāha^ādiṣu jana^saṃdrāveṣu prāyatnikaṃ
GS39kamasutu:846: 3.1.15/.varaṇa^artham upagatāṃś ca bhadra^darśanān pradakṣiṇa^vācaś ca tatsaṃbandhi^saṃgatān puruṣān maṅgalaiḥ pratigṛhṇīyuḥ/
GS39kamasutu:849: 3.1.18/.snāna^ādiṣu niyujyamānā varayitāraḥ sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati^ity uktvā na tad^ahar^eva^abhyupagaccheyuḥ//(p.196)
GS39kamasutu:850: 3.1.19/.deśa^pravṛtti^sātmyād vā brāhma^prājāpatya^ārṣa^daivānām anyatamena vivāhena śāstrataḥ pariṇayet/ iti varaṇa^vidhānam//(p.196)
GS39kamasutu:861: 3.1.24cd/.na tv eva hīna^saṃbandhaṃ kuryāt sadbhir vininditam//(p.197)
GS39kamasutu:863_0: 3.2.1 /.saṃgatayos trirātram adhaḥ śayyā brahma^caryaṃ kṣāra^lavaṇa^varjam āhāras
GS39kamasutu:863_1: tathā saptāhaṃ satūrya^maṅgala^snānaṃ prasādhanaṃ saha^bhojanaṃ ca prekṣā saṃbandhināṃ
GS39kamasutu:864: 3.2.2/.tasminn etāṃ niśi vijane mṛdubhir upacārair upakrameta//(p.198)
GS39kamasutu:865: 3.2.3/.trirātram avacanaṃ hi stambham iva nāyakaṃ paśyantī kanyā nirvidyeta paribhavec ca tṛtīyām iva prakṛtim/ iti bābhravīyāḥ//(p.199)
GS39kamasutu:866: 3.2.4/.upakrameta visrambhayec ca, na tu brahmacaryam ativarteta/ iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.199)
GS39kamasutu:868: 3.2.6/.kusuma^sadharmāṇo hi yoṣitaḥ sukumāra^upakramāḥ/ tās tv anadhigata^viśvāsaiḥ prasabham upakramyamāṇāḥ saṃprayoga^dveṣiṇyo bhavanti/ tasmāt sāmnā^eva^upacaret//(p.199)
GS39kamasutu:869: 3.2.7/.yuktyā^api tu yataḥ prasaram upalabhet tena^eva^anu praviśet//(p.200)
GS39kamasutu:873_1: ca sāntvanair vākyaiḥ śapathaiḥ pratiyācitaiḥ pāda^patanaiś ca grāhayet / vrīḍā^yuktā^api
GS39kamasutu:873_2: yoṣid^atyanta^kruddhā^api na pāda^patanam ativartate iti sārvatrikam //(p.200)
GS39kamasutu:876: 3.2.14/.tac^chravaṇa^arthaṃ yat kiṃ cid alpa^akṣara^abhidheyam ajānann iva pṛcchet/
GS39kamasutu:877: 3.2.15/.tatra niṣpratipattim anudvejayan sāntvanā yuktaṃ bahuśa eva pṛcchet/
GS39kamasutu:879: 3.2.17/.sarvā eva hi kanyāḥ puruṣeṇa prayujyamānaṃ vacanaṃ viṣa^hante/ na tu laghu^miśrām api vācaṃ vadanti/ iti ghoṭakamukhaḥ//(p.201)
GS39kamasutu:880: 3.2.18/.nirbadhyamānā tu śiraḥ^kampena prativacanāni yojayet/ kalahe tu na śiraḥ kampayet//(p.202)
GS39kamasutu:881: 3.2.19/.icchasi māṃ na^icchasi vā kiṃ te +ahaṃ rucito na rucito vā^iti pṛṣṭā ciraṃ sthitvā nirbadhyamānā tadā^anukūlyena śiraḥ kampayet/ prapañcyamānā tu vivadet//(p.202)
GS39kamasutu:882_0: 3.2.20 /.saṃstutā cet sakhīm anukūlām ubhayato +api visrabdhāṃ tām antarā kṛtvā kathāṃ
GS39kamasutu:882_1: yojayet / tasminn adhomukhī vihaset / tāṃ ca^ativādinīm adhikṣiped vivadec ca / sā
GS39kamasutu:882_2: tu parihāsa^artham idam anayā^uktam iti ca^anuktam (p.202)
GS39kamasutu:883: api brūyāt/ tatra tām apanudya prativacana^artham abhyarthyamānā tūṣṇīm āsīta/ nirbadhyamānā tu na^aham evaṃ bravīmi^ity avyakta^akṣaram
GS39kamasutu:884: anavasita^arthaṃ vacanaṃ brūyāt/ nāyakaṃ ca vihasantī kadā cit kaṭākṣaiḥ prekṣeta/ ity ālāpa^yojanam//(p.203)
GS39kamasutu:885: 3.2.21/.evaṃ jāta^paricayā ca^anirvadantī tat^samīpe yācitaṃ tāmbūlaṃ vilepanaṃ srajaṃ nidadhyāt/ uttarīye vā^asya nibadhnīyāt/
GS39kamasutu:887_0: 3.2.23 /.vāryamāṇaś ca tvam api māṃ pariṣvajasva tato na^evam ācariṣyāmi^iti sthityā
GS39kamasutu:887_1: pariṣvañjayet / svaṃ ca hastam ā nābhi^deśāt prasārya nirvartayet / krameṇa ca^enām
GS39kamasutu:887_2: utsaṅgam āropya^adhikam adhikam upakramet / apratipadyamānāṃ ca bhīṣayet //(p.203)
GS39kamasutu:888_0: 3.2.24 /.ahaṃ khalu tava danta^padāny adhare kariṣyāmi stana^pṛṣṭhe ca nakha^padam /
GS39kamasutu:888_1: ātmanaś ca svayaṃ kṛtvā tvayā kṛtam iti te sakhī^janasya purataḥ kathayiṣyāmi / sā
GS39kamasutu:888_2: tvaṃ kim atra vakṣyasi^iti bāla^vibhīṣikair bāla^pratyāyanaiś ca śanair enāṃ pratārayet /
GS39kamasutu:889: 3.2.25/.dvitīyasyāṃ tṛtīyasyāṃ ca rātrau kiṃ cid adhikaṃ visrambhitāṃ hastena yojayet//(p.204)
GS39kamasutu:891_1: api saṃvāhayet / nivārite saṃvāhane ko doṣa ity ākulayed enām / tac ca sthirīkuryāt /

GS39kamasutu:894_0: 3.2.29 /.anuśiṣyāc ca / ātma^anurāgaṃ darśayet / manorathāṃś ca pūrva^kālikān anuvarṇayet /
GS39kamasutu:894_1: āyatyāṃ ca tadā^anukūlyena pravṛttiṃ pratijānīyāt / sapatnībhyaś ca sādhvasam avacchindyāt /
GS39kamasutu:894_2: kālena ca krameṇa vimukta^kanyā^bhāvām anudvejayann upakrameta / iti kanyā^visrambhaṇam //(p.205)
GS39kamasutu:901: 3.2.32cd/.kanyā^visrambhaṇaṃ vetti yaḥ sa tāsāṃ priyo bhavet//(p.206)
GS39kamasutu:905: 3.2.34cd/.bhayaṃ vitrāsam udvegaṃ sadyo dveṣaṃ ca gacchati//(p.207)
GS39kamasutu:913: bāla^vṛttir ucita^praveśo vā kanyām alabhyatvān na varayet/
GS39kamasutu:916: mātrā ca pitrā ca viyuktaḥ paribhūta^kalpo dhana^utkarṣā^dalabhyāṃ mātula^duhitaram anyasmai vā pūrva^dattāṃ sādhayet/
GS39kamasutu:918: 3.3.5/.bālāyām evaṃ sati dharma^adhigame saṃvananaṃ ślāghyam iti ghoṭakamukhaḥ//(p.208)
GS39kamasutu:919: 3.3.6/.tayā saha puṣpa^avacayaṃ grathanaṃ gṛhakaṃ duhitṛkā^krīḍā^yojanaṃ bhakta^pāna^karaṇam iti kurvīta/ paricayasya vayasaś ca^anurūpyāt/
GS39kamasutu:920_1: ṣaṭ^pāṣāṇaka^ādīni ca deśyāni tat^sātmyāt tad^āpta^dāsa^ceṭikābhis tayā ca saha^anukrīḍeta /
GS39kamasutu:921: 3.3.8/.kṣveḍitakāni sunimīlitakām ārabdhikāṃ lavaṇa^vīthikām anila^tāḍitakāṃ godhūma^puñjikām aṅguli^tāḍitakāṃ sakhībhir anyāni ca deśyāni//(p.209)
GS39kamasutu:922: 3.3.9/.yāṃ ca viśvāsyām asyāṃ manyeta tayā saha nirantarāṃ prītiṃ kuryāt/ paricayāṃś ca budhyeta/
GS39kamasutu:923: 3.3.10/.dhātreyikāṃ ca^asyāḥ priya^hitābhyām adhikam upagṛhṇīyāt/ sā hi prīyamāṇā vidita^ākārā^apy apratyādiśantī taṃ tāṃ ca yojayituṃ śaknuyāt/ anabhihitā^api pratyācāryakam/
GS39kamasutu:924: 3.3.11/.avidita^ākārā^api hi guṇān eva^anurāgāt prakāśayet/ yathā prayojyā^anurajyeta/
GS39kamasutu:925: 3.3.12/.yatra yatra ca kautukaṃ prayojyāyās tad anu praviśya sādhayet/
GS39kamasutu:926: 3.3.13/.krīḍanaka^dravyāṇi yāny apūrvāṇi yāny anyāsāṃ viralaśo vidyeraṃs tāny asyā ayatnena saṃpādayet/
GS39kamasutu:927: 3.3.14/.tatra kandukam aneka^bhakti^citram alpa^kāla^antaritam anyad anyac ca saṃdarśayet/ tathā sūtra^dāru^gavala^gaja^danta^mayīr duhitṛkā madhu^ucchiṣṭa^piṣṭa^mṛṇ^mayīś ca/
GS39kamasutu:929_0: 3.3.16 /.kāṣṭha^medhrakayoś ca saṃyuktayoś ca strī^puṃsayor aja^eḍakānāṃ deva^kula^gṛhakānāṃ
GS39kamasutu:929_2: ca vicitra^ākṛti^saṃyuktānāṃ jala^bhājanānāṃ ca yantrikāṇāṃ vīṇikānāṃ paṭolikānām (p.210)
GS39kamasutu:931: pūga^phalānāṃ pattrāṇāṃ kāla^yuktānāṃ ca śakti^viṣaye pracchannaṃ dānaṃ prakāśa^dravyāṇāṃ ca prakāśam/ yathā ca sarva^abhiprāya^saṃvardhakam enaṃ manyeta tathā prayatitavyam/
GS39kamasutu:933: 3.3.18/.pracchanna^dānasya tu kāraṇam ātmano guru^janād bhayaṃ khyāpayet/ deyasya ca^anyena spṛhaṇīyatvam iti/
GS39kamasutu:934: 3.3.19/.vardhamāna^anurāgaṃ ca^ākhyānake manaḥ kurvatīm anvarthābhiḥ kathābhiś citta^hāriṇībhiś ca rañjayet/
GS39kamasutu:935_0: 3.3.20 /.vismayeṣu prasahyamānām indra^jālaiḥ prayogair vismāpayet / kalāsu kautukinīṃ
GS39kamasutu:935_1: tat^kauśalena gīta^priyāṃ śruti^harair gītaiḥ / āśvayujyām aṣṭamī^candrake kaumudyām
GS39kamasutu:935_2: utsaveṣu yātrāyāṃ grahaṇe gṛha^ācāre vā vicitrair āpīḍaiḥ *karṇa[ch:
GS39kamasutu:936: karṇaṃ]^pattra^bhaṅgaiḥ sikthaka^pradhānair vastra^aṅgulīyaka^bhūṣaṇa^dānaiś ca/ no ced doṣa^karāṇi manyeta/
GS39kamasutu:939: 3.3.23/.udāra^veṣaś ca svayam anupahata^darśanaś syāt/ bhāvaṃ ca kurvatīm iṅgita^ākāraiḥ sūcayet/
GS39kamasutu:940: 3.3.24/.yuvatayo hi saṃsṛṣṭam abhīkṣṇa^darśanaṃ ca puruṣaṃ prathamaṃ kāmayante/ kāmayamānā api tu na^abhiyuñjata iti prāyovādaḥ/ iti bālāyām upakramāḥ//(p.211)
GS39kamasutu:942: 3.3.26/.saṃmukhaṃ taṃ tu na vīkṣate/ vīkṣitā vrīḍāṃ darśayati/ rucyam ātmano +aṅgam apadeśena prakāśayati/ pramattaṃ pracchannaṃ nāyakam atikrāntaṃ ca vīkṣate/
GS39kamasutu:943_0: 3.3.27 /.pṛṣṭā ca kiṃ cit sasmitam avyakta^akṣaram anavasitā^arthaṃ ca mandaṃ mandam
GS39kamasutu:943_1: adhomukhī kathayati / tat^samīpe ciraṃ sthānam abhinandati / dūre sthitā paśyatu
GS39kamasutu:943_2: mām iti manyamānā parijanaṃ savadana^vikāram ābhāṣate / taṃ deśaṃ na muñcati /
GS39kamasutu:944_0: 3.3.28 /.yat kiṃ cid dṛṣṭvā vihasitaṃ karoti / tatra kathām avasthāna^artham anubadhnāti /
GS39kamasutu:944_1: bālasya^aṅka^gatasya^āliṅganaṃ cumbanaṃ ca karoti / paricārikāyās tilakaṃ ca racayati /
GS39kamasutu:944_2: parijanānavaṣṭabhya tās tāś ca līlā darśayati /
GS39kamasutu:945_0: 3.3.29 /.tan^mitreṣu viśvasiti / vacanaṃ ca^eṣāṃ bahu manyate karoti ca / tat^paricārakaiḥ
GS39kamasutu:945_1: saha prītiṃ saṃkathāṃ dyūtam iti ca karoti / svakarmasu ca prabhaviṣṇur iva^etān
GS39kamasutu:945_2: niyuñkte / teṣu ca nāyaka^saṃkathām anyasya kathayatsv avahitā tāṃ śṛṇoti /

GS39kamasutu:947_0: pariharati / karṇa^pattram aṅgulīyakaṃ srajaṃ vā tena yācitā sadhīram eva gātrād
GS39kamasutu:947_1: avatārya sakhyā haste dadāti / tena ca dattaṃ nityaṃ dhārayati / anya^vara^saṃkathāsu
GS39kamasutu:948: ca saha na saṃsṛjyata iti//(p.215) bhavataś ca^atra ślokau ---(p.215)

GS39kamasutu:959: 3.4.6/.jala^krīḍāyāṃ tad^dūrato +apsu nimagnaḥ samīpam asyā gatvā spṛṣṭvā ca^enāṃ tatra^eva^unmajjet//(p.217)
GS39kamasutu:972: 3.4.19/.vijane tamasi ca dvandvam āsīnaḥ kṣāntiṃ kruvīta/ samāna^deśa^śayyāyāṃ ca//(p.218)
GS39kamasutu:974: 3.4.21/.vivikte ca kiṃ cid asti kathayitavyam ity uktvā nirvacanaṃ bhāvaṃ ca tatra^upalakṣayet/ yathā pāra^dārike vakṣyāmaḥ//(p.219)
GS39kamasutu:975: 3.4.22/.vidita^bhāvas tu vyādhim apadiśya^enāṃ vārtā^grahaṇa^arthaṃ svam udavasitam ānayet//(p.219)
GS39kamasutu:976: 3.4.23/.āgatāyāś ca śiraḥ^pīḍane niyogaḥ/ pāṇim avalambya ca^asyāḥ sākāraṃ nayanayor lalāṭe ca nidadhyāt//(p.219)
GS39kamasutu:978: 3.4.25/.idaṃ tvayā kartavyam/ na hy etad ṛte kanyayā anyena kāryam iti gacchantīṃ punar āgamana^anubandham enāṃ visṛjet//(p.220)
GS39kamasutu:979: 3.4.26/.asya ca yogasya trirātraṃ trisaṃdhyaṃ ca prayuktiḥ//(p.220)
GS39kamasutu:981: 3.4.28/.anyābhir api saha viśvāsana^artham adhikam adhikaṃ ca^abhiyuñjīta/ na tu vācā nirvadet//(p.220)
GS39kamasutu:982: 3.4.29/.dūragata^bhāvo +api hi kanyāsu na nirvedena siddhyati^iti ghoṭakamukhaḥ//(p.220)
GS39kamasutu:984: 3.4.31/.pradoṣe niśi tamasi ca yoṣito manda^sādhvasāḥ surata^(p.220)
GS39kamasutu:985: vyavasāyinyo rāgavatyaś ca bhavanti/ na ca puruṣaṃ pratyācakṣate/ tasmāt tatkālaṃ prayojayitavyā iti prāyovādaḥ//(p.221)
GS39kamasutu:986_0: 3.4.32 /.eka^puruṣa^abhiyogānāṃ tv asaṃbhave gṛhīta^arthayā dhātreyikayā sakhyā vā
GS39kamasutu:986_1: tasyām antarbhūtayā tam artham anirvadantyā saha^enām aṅkam ānāyayet / tato yathoktam
GS39kamasutu:987: 3.4.33/.svāṃ vā paricārikām ādāv eva sakhītvena^asyāḥ praṇidadhyāt//(p.221)
GS39kamasutu:988: 3.4.34/.yajñe vivāhe yātrāyām utsave vyasane prekṣaṇaka^vyāpṛte jane tatra tatra ca dṛṣṭa^iṅgita^ākārāṃ parīkṣita^bhāvām ekākinīm upakrameta/
GS39kamasutu:989: 3.4.35/.na hi dṛṣṭa^bhāvā yoṣito deśe kāle ca prayujyamānā vyāvartanta iti vātsyāyanaḥ/ ity ekapuruṣa^abhiyogāḥ/(p.221)
GS39kamasutu:990: 3.4.36/.manda^apadeśā guṇavaty api kanyā dhana^hīnā kulīnā^api samānair ayācyāmānā mātā^pitṛ^viyuktā vā jñāti^kula^vartinī vā prāpta^yauvanā pāṇi^grahaṇaṃ svayam abhīpseta//(p.222)
GS39kamasutu:992: 3.4.38/.yaṃ vā manyeta mātā^pitror asamīkṣayā svayam apy ayam indriya^daurbalyān mayi pravartiṣyata iti priya^hita^upacārair abhīkṣṇa^saṃdarśanena ca tam āvarjayet//(p.222)
GS39kamasutu:993: 3.4.39/.mātā ca^enāṃ sakhībhir dhātreyikābhiś ca saha tad^abhimukhīṃ kuryāt//(p.223)
GS39kamasutu:994_1: vā saṃvāhane śirasaḥ pīḍane ca^aucitya^darśanam / prayojyasya sātmya^yuktāḥ kathā^yogāḥ
GS39kamasutu:995: 3.4.41/.na ca^eva^antarā^api puruṣaṃ svayam abhiyuñjīta/ svayam abhiyoginī hi yuvatiḥ saubhāgyaṃ jahāti^ity^ācāryāḥ//(p.223)
GS39kamasutu:997: 3.4.43/.pariṣvaktā ca na vikṛtiṃ bhajet/ ślakṣṇam ākāram ajānatī^iva pratigṛhṇīyāt/ vadana^grahaṇe balāt kāraḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1000: 3.4.46/.yadā tu manyeta^anurakto mayi na vyāvartiṣyata iti tadā^eva^enam abhiyuñjānaṃ bāla^bhāva^mokṣāya *tvarayet[ch:tvaret]/
GS39kamasutu:1003: 3.4.48b/.anukūlaṃ ca vaśyaṃ ca tasya kuryāt parigraham//(p.224)
GS39kamasutu:1009: 3.4.51b/.guṇair yukto +api na tv evaṃ bahu^sādhāraṇaḥ patiḥ//(p.225)
GS39kamasutu:1012: 3.4.53a/.nīco yas tv abhiyuñjīta puruṣaḥ palito +api vā/
GS39kamasutu:1015: 3.4.54b/.sapatnīkaś ca sa^apatyo na sa saṃyogam arhati//
GS39kamasutu:1020: 3.5.2/.sā ca^enām aviditā nāma nāyakasya bhūtvā tad^guṇair anurañjayet/ tasyāś ca rucyān nāyaka^guṇān bhūyiṣṭham upavarṇayet/
GS39kamasutu:1022: 3.5.4/.mātā^pitroś ca guṇān abhijñatāṃ lubdhatāṃ ca capalatāṃ ca bāndhavānām/
GS39kamasutu:1023: 3.5.5/.yāś ca^anyā api samāna^jātīyāḥ kanyāḥ śakuntalā^ādyāḥ svabuddhyā bhartāraṃ prāpya saṃprayuktā modante sma tāś ca^asyā nidarśayet/
GS39kamasutu:1028: 3.5.9/.samanorathāyāś ca^asyā apāyaṃ sādhvasaṃ vrīḍāṃ ca hetubhir avacchindyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1030: 3.5.11/.tvām ajānatīm iva nāyako balād grahīṣyati^iti tathā suparigṛhītaṃ syād iti yojayet//(p.227)
GS39kamasutu:1031: 3.5.12/.pratipannām abhipreta^avakāśa^vartinīṃ nāyakaḥ śrotriya^āgārād agnim ānāyya kuśān āstīrya yathāsmṛti hutvā ca triḥ parikramet/
GS39kamasutu:1033: 3.5.14/.agni^sākṣikā hi vivāhā na nivartanta ity ācārya^samayaḥ//(p.228)
GS39kamasutu:1035: 3.5.16/.tad^bāndhavāś ca yathā kulasya^adhaṃ pariharanto daṇḍa^bhayāc ca tasmā eva^enāṃ dadyus tathā yojayet/
GS39kamasutu:1036: 3.5.17/.anantaraṃ ca prīty^upagraheṇa rāgeṇa tad^bāndhavān prīṇayed iti/
GS39kamasutu:1038: 3.5.19/.apratipadyamānāyām antaś cāriṇīm anyāṃ kula^pramadāṃ pūrva^saṃsṛṣṭāṃ prīyamāṇāṃ ca^upagṛhya tayā saha viṣahyam avakāśam enām anya^kārya^apadeśena^ānayayet/
GS39kamasutu:1040: 3.5.21/.āsanne ca vivāhe mātaram asyās tad abhimata^doṣair anuśayaṃ grāhayet/
GS39kamasutu:1041: 3.5.22/.tatas tad^anumatena prātiveśya^abhavane niśi nāyakam ānāyya śrotriya^āgārād agnim iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa//(p.229)
GS39kamasutu:1042: 3.5.23/.bhrātaram asyā vā samāna^vayasaṃ veśyāsu parastrīṣu vā prasaktam asukareṇa sāhāya^dānena priya^upagrahaiś ca sudīrgha^kālam anurañjayet/ ante ca sva^abhiprāyaṃ grāhayet/
GS39kamasutu:1043_0: 3.5.24 /.prāyeṇa hi yuvānaḥ samāna^śīla^vyasana^vayasāṃ vayasyānām arthe jīvitam
GS39kamasutu:1043_1: api tyajanti / tatas tena^eva^anyakāryāt tām ānāyayet / viṣahyaṃ sā^avakāśam iti
GS39kamasutu:1044_0: 3.5.25 /.aṣṭamī^candrika^ādiṣu ca dhātreyikā madanīyam enāṃ pāyayitvā kiṃ cid ātmanaḥ
GS39kamasutu:1044_1: kāryam uddiśya nāyakasya viṣahyaṃ deśam ānayet / tatra^enāṃ madāt saṃjñām apratipadyamānāṃ
GS39kamasutu:1045: 3.5.26/.suptāṃ ca^ekacāriṇīṃ dhātreyikāṃ vārayitvā saṃjñām apratipadyamānāṃ dūṣayitvā^iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa//(p.230)
GS39kamasutu:1046: 3.5.27/.grāma^antaram udyānaṃ vā gacchantīṃ viditvā susaṃbhṛta^sahāyo nāyakas tadā rakṣiṇo vitrāsya hatvā vā kanyām apaharet/ iti vivāha^yogāḥ//(p.231)
GS39kamasutu:1047: 3.5.28a/.pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ pradhānaṃ syād vivāho dharmataḥ sthiteḥ/(p.231)
GS39kamasutu:1048: 3.5.28b/.pūrva^abhāve tataḥ kāryo yo ya uttara uttaraḥ//(p.231)
GS39kamasutu:1057: 4.1.3/.veśma ca śuci susaṃmṛṣṭa^sthānaṃ viracita^vividha^kusumaṃ ślakṣṇa^bhūmi^talaṃ hṛdya^darśanaṃ triṣavaṇa^ācarita^bali^karma pūjita^deva^āyatanaṃ kuryāt//(p.233)
GS39kamasutu:1059: 4.1.5/.guruṣu bhṛtya^vargeṣu nāyaka^bhaginīṣu tat^patiṣu ca yathā^arhaṃ pratipattiḥ//(p.234)
GS39kamasutu:1061_1: anyāṃś ca bahu^puṣpān bālaka^uśīraka^pātālikāṃś ca vṛkṣa^vāṭikāyāṃ ca sthaṇḍilāni
GS39kamasutu:1064: 4.1.10/.bhojane ca rucitam idam asmai dveṣyam idaṃ pathyam idam apathyam idam iti ca vindyāt//(p.235)
GS39kamasutu:1065: 4.1.11/.svaraṃ bahir upaśrutya bhavanam āgacchataḥ kiṃ kṛtyam iti bruvatī sajjā bhavana^madhye tiṣṭhet//(p.235)
GS39kamasutu:1067: 4.1.13/.nāyakasya ca na vimukta^bhūṣaṇaṃ vijane saṃdarśane tiṣṭhet//(p.235)
GS39kamasutu:1069: 4.1.15/.āvāhe vivāhe yajñe gamanaṃ sakhībhiḥ saha goṣṭhīṃ devatā^abhigamanam ity anujñātā kuryāt//(p.235)
GS39kamasutu:1071: 4.1.17/.paścāt saṃveśanaṃ pūrvam utthānam anavabodhanaṃ ca suptasya//(p.236)
GS39kamasutu:1074: 4.1.20/.sādhikṣepa^vacanaṃ tv enaṃ mitra^jana^madhyastham ekākinaṃ vā^apy upālabheta/ na ca mūla^kārikā syāt//(p.236)
GS39kamasutu:1076: 4.1.22/.durvyāhṛtaṃ durnirīkṣitam anyato mantraṇaṃ dvāra^deśa^avasthānaṃ nirīkṣaṇaṃ vā niṣkuṭeṣu mantraṇaṃ vivikteṣu ciram avasthānam iti varjayet//(p.236)
GS39kamasutu:1078: 4.1.24/.bahu^bhūṣaṇaṃ vividha^kusuma^anulepanaṃ vividha^aṅga^rāga^samujjvalaṃ vāsa ity ābhigāmiko veṣaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1079: 4.1.25/.pratanu^ślakṣṇa^alpa^dukūlatā parimitam ābharaṇaṃ sugandhitā na^atyulbaṇam anulepanam/ tathā śuklāny anyāni puṣpāṇi^iti vaihāriko veṣaḥ//(p.237)
GS39kamasutu:1080: 4.1.26/.nāyakasya vratam upavāsaṃ ca svayam api karaṇena^anuvarteta/ vāritāyāṃ ca na^aham atra nirbandhanīya^iti tad^vacaso nivartanam//(p.237)
GS39kamasutu:1082: 4.1.28/.tathā lavaṇa^snehayoś ca gandha^dravya^kaṭuka^bhāṇḍa^oṣadhānāṃ ca durlabhānāṃ bhavanesu pracchannaṃ nidhānam//(p.237)
GS39kamasutu:1084: 4.1.30/.svasya ca sārasya parebhyo na^ākhyānaṃ bhartṛ^mantritasya ca//(p.238)
GS39kamasutu:1085: 4.1.31/.samānāś ca striyaḥ kauśalena^ujjvalatayā pākena mānena tathā^upacārair atiśayīta//(p.238)
GS39kamasutu:1087_1: ca sūtra^kartanam sūtrasya vānam / śikya^rajju^pāśa^valkala^saṃgrahaṇam / kuṭṭana^kaṇḍana^avekṣaṇam / *ācāma[ch:
GS39kamasutu:1091: kukkuṭa]^lāvaka^śuka^śārikā^parabhṛta^mayūra^vānara^mṛgā ṇām avekṣaṇam/ daivasikāya^vyaya^piṇḍīkaraṇam iti ca vidyāt//(p.238)
GS39kamasutu:1092: 4.1.34/.taj^jaghanyānāṃ ca jīrṇa^vāsasāṃ saṃcayas tair vividha^rāgaiḥ śuddhair vā kṛta^karmaṇāṃ paricārakāṇām anugraho māna^artheṣu ca dānam anyatra vā^upayogaḥ//(p.239)
GS39kamasutu:1093: 4.1.35/.surā^kumbhīnām āsava^kumbhīnāṃ ca sthāpanaṃ tad^upayogaḥ kraya^vikrayāv āyavyayā^avekṣaṇam//(p.239)
GS39kamasutu:1095: 4.1.37/.śvaśrū^śvaśura^paricaryā tat^pāratantryam anuttara^vāditā parimita^apracaṇḍa^ālāpakaraṇam anuccair hāsaḥ/ tat^priya^apriyeṣu svapriya^apriyeṣv iva vṛttiḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1099: 4.1.41/.svakarmasu bhṛtyajana^niyamanam utsaveṣu ca^asya pūjanam ity ekacāriṇī^vṛttam//(p.240)
GS39kamasutu:1100: 4.1.42/.pravāse maṅgala^mātra^ābharaṇā devatā^upavāsa^parā vārtāyāṃ sthitā gṛhān avekṣeta//(p.240)
GS39kamasutu:1101: 4.1.43/.śayyā ca guru^jana^mūle/ tad abhimatā kārya^niṣpattiḥ/ nāyaka^abhimatānāṃ ca^arthānām arjane pratisaṃskāre ca yatnaḥ//(p.240)
GS39kamasutu:1102: 4.1.44/.nitya^naimittikeṣu karmasu^ucito vyayaḥ/ tad^ārabdhānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ samāpane matiḥ//(p.240)
GS39kamasutu:1103: 4.1.45/.jñāti^kulasya^anabhigamanam anyatra vyasana^utsavābhyām/ tatra^api nāyaka^parijana^adhiṣṭhitāyā na^atikālam avasthānam aparivartita^pravāsa^veṣatā ca//(p.241)
GS39kamasutu:1104: 4.1.46/.guru^jana^anujñātānāṃ karaṇam upavāsānām/ paricārakaiḥ śucibhir ājñā^adhiṣṭhitair anumatena kraya^vikraya^karmaṇā sārasya^āpūraṇaṃ tanū^karaṇaṃ ca śaktyā vyayānām//(p.241)
GS39kamasutu:1105: 4.1.47/.āgate ca prakṛtisthāyā eva prathamato darśanaṃ daivata^pūjanam upahārāṇāṃ ca^āharaṇam iti pravāsa^caryā//(p.241)
GS39kamasutu:1109: 4.1.49ab/.dharmam arthaṃ tathā kāmaṃ labhante sthānam eva ca/(p.242)
GS39kamasutu:1112: 4.2.1/.jāḍya^dauḥśīlya^daurbhāgyebhyaḥ prajān utpatter ābhīkṣṇyena dārika^utpatter nāyaka^cāpalād vā sapatny^adhivedanam//(p.242)
GS39kamasutu:1113: 4.2.2/.tadā^ādita eva bhakti^śīla^vaidagdhyakhyāpanena parijihīrṣet/ prajān utpattau ca svayam eva sāpatnake codayet//(p.242)
GS39kamasutu:1114: 4.2.3/.adhividyamānā ca yāvac chakti^yogād ātmano +adhikatvena sthitiṃ kārayet//(p.243)
GS39kamasutu:1115: 4.2.4/.āgatāṃ ca^enāṃ bhaginīvad īkṣeta/ nāyaka^viditaṃ ca prādoṣikaṃ vidhim atīva yatnād asyāḥ kārayet saubhāgyajaṃ vaikṛtam utsekaṃ vā^asyā na^adriyeta//(p.243)
GS39kamasutu:1116: 4.2.5/.bhartari pramādyantīm upekṣeta/ yatra manyeta^artham iyaṃ svayam api pratipatsyata iti tatra^enām ādarata eva^anuśiṣyāt//(p.243)
GS39kamasutu:1118: 4.2.7/.tad^apatyeṣv aviśeṣaḥ/ parijana^varge +adhika^anukampā/ mitra^varge prītiḥ/ ātma^jñātiṣu na^atyādaraḥ/ tajjñātiṣu ca^atisaṃbhramaḥ//(p.244)
GS39kamasutu:1120: 4.2.9/.yāṃ tu nāyako +adhikāṃ cikīrṣet tāṃ bhūta^pūrva^subhagayā protsāhya kalahayet//(p.244)
GS39kamasutu:1122: 4.2.11/.tābhir ekatvena^adhikāṃ cikīrṣitāṃ svayam avivadamānā durjanī kuryāt//(p.244)
GS39kamasutu:1123: 4.2.12/.nāyakena tu kalahitām enāṃ pakṣapātāv alambana^upabṛṃhitām āśvāsayet//(p.244)
GS39kamasutu:1125: 4.2.14/.mandaṃ vā kalaham upalabhya svayam eva saṃdhukṣayet//(p.245)
GS39kamasutu:1126: 4.2.15/.yadi nāyako +asyām adya^api sānunaya iti manyeta tadā svayam eva saṃdhau prayateta^iti jyeṣṭhā^vṛttam//(p.245)
GS39kamasutu:1137: 4.2.26/.tat tu ślāghayā rāgeṇa vā bahir na^acakṣīta//(p.246)
GS39kamasutu:1140: 4.2.29/.durbhagām anapatyāṃ ca jyeṣṭhām anukampeta nāyakena ca^anukampayet//(p.246)
GS39kamasutu:1141: 4.2.30/.prasahya tv enām ekacāriṇī^vṛttam anutiṣṭhed iti kaniṣṭhā^vṛttam//(p.246)
GS39kamasutu:1142: 4.2.31/.vidhavā tv indriya^daurbalyād āturā bhoginaṃ guṇa^saṃpannaṃ ca yā punar vindet sā punarbhūḥ//(p.247)
GS39kamasutu:1143: 4.2.32/.yatas tu svecchayā punar api niṣkramaṇaṃ nirguṇo +ayam iti tadā anyaṃ kāṅkṣed iti bābhravīyāḥ//(p.247)
GS39kamasutu:1145: 4.2.34/.guṇeṣu sopabhogeṣu sukha^sākalyaṃ tasmāt tato viśeṣa iti gonardīyaḥ//(p.247)
GS39kamasutu:1148: 4.2.37/.ātmanaḥ sāreṇa vālaṃkāraṃ tadīyam ātmīyaṃ vā bibhṛyāt//(p.248)
GS39kamasutu:1150: 4.2.39/.svecchayā ca gṛhān nirgacchantī prīti^dāyād anyan nāyaka^dattaṃ jīyeta/ niṣkāsyamānā tu na kiṃ cid dadyāt//(p.248)
GS39kamasutu:1153: 4.2.42/.dākṣiṇyena parijane sarvatra saparihāsā mitreṣu pratipattiḥ/ kalāsu kauśalam adhikasya ca jñānam//(p.248)
GS39kamasutu:1155: 4.2.44/.rahasi ca kalayā catuḥṣaṣṭyā^anuvarteta/ sapatnīnāṃ ca svayam upakuryāt/ tāsām apatyeṣv ābharaṇa^dānam/ teṣu *svāmivad[ch:
GS39kamasutu:1156: svāmīvad] upacāraḥ/ maṇḍanakāni veṣān ādareṇa kurvīta/ parijane mitravarge ca^adhikaṃ viśrāṇanam/ samāja^āpānaka^udyānayātrā^vihāra^śīlatā ca^iti punarbhū^vṛttam//(p.249)
GS39kamasutu:1157: 4.2.45/.durbhagā tu sāpatnaka^pīḍitā yā tāsām adhikam iva patyāv upacaret tām āśrayet/ *prakāśyāni[ch:
GS39kamasutu:1158: prakāmyāni] ca kalā^vijñānāni darśayet/ daurbhāgyād rahasyānām abhāvaḥ//(p.249)
GS39kamasutu:1160: 4.2.47/.tan mitrāṇi ca^upagṛhya tair bhaktim ātmanaḥ prakāśayet//(p.250)
GS39kamasutu:1165: 4.2.52/.yayā ca kalahitaḥ syāt kāmaṃ tām āvartayet//(p.250)
GS39kamasutu:1166: 4.2.53/.yāṃ ca pracchannāṃ kāmayet tām anena saha saṃgamayed gopayec ca//(p.250)
GS39kamasutu:1167: 4.2.54/.yathā ca pativratātvam aśāṭhyaṃ nāyako manyeta tathā prativid adhyād iti durbhagā^vṛttam//(p.251)
GS39kamasutu:1168: 4.2.55/.antaḥpurāṇāṃ ca vṛttam eteṣv eva prakaraṇeṣu lakṣayet//(p.251)
GS39kamasutu:1169: 4.2.56/.mālyā^anulepana^vāsāṃsi ca^āsāṃ kañcukīyā mahattarikā vā rājño nivedayeyur devībhiḥ prahitam iti/
GS39kamasutu:1171: 4.2.58/.alaṃkṛtaś ca svalaṃkṛtāni ca^aparāhṇe sarvāṇy antaḥpurāṇya^ekadhyena paśyet//(p.251)
GS39kamasutu:1172: 4.2.59/.tāsāṃ yathā^kālaṃ yathā^arhaṃ ca sthāna^māna^anuvṛttiḥ saparihāsāś ca kathāḥ kuryāt//(p.251)
GS39kamasutu:1176_0: 4.2.63 /.vāsaka^pālyas tu yasyā vāsako yasyāś ca^atīto yasyāś ca ṛtus tat^paricārika^anugatā
GS39kamasutu:1176_1: divā śayyā^utthitasya rājñas tābhyāṃ prahitam aṅgulīyaka^aṅkam anulepanam ṛtuṃ vāsakaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1177: 4.2.64/.tatra rājā yad gṛhṇīyāt tasyā vāsakam ājñāpayet//(p.252)
GS39kamasutu:1178: 4.2.65/.utsaveṣu ca sarvāsām anurūpeṇa pūjā^āpānakaṃ ca/ saṃgīta^darśaneṣu ca//(p.252)
GS39kamasutu:1179: 4.2.66/.antaḥpura^cāriṇīnāṃ bahir aniṣkramo bāhyānāṃ ca^apraveśaḥ/ anyatra vidita^śaucābhyaḥ/ aparikliṣṭaś ca karma^yoga ity āntaḥpurikam//(p.252)
GS39kamasutu:1181: 4.2.67ab/.puruṣas tu bahūn dārān samāhṛtya samo bhavet/(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1182: 4.2.67cd/.na ca^avajñāṃ cared āsu vyalīkān na saheta ca//(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1184: 4.2.68cd/.visrambhād vā^apy upālambhas tam anyāsu na kīrtayet//(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1185: 4.2.69ab/.na dadyāt prasaraṃ strīṇāṃ sapatnyāḥ kāraṇe kva cit/(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1188: 4.2.70cd/.bahu^mānais tathā ca^anyām ity evaṃ rañjayet striyaḥ//(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1194: 5.1.strīpuruṣaśīlavasthāpanaṃ vyāvartanakāraṇāṇi strīṣu siddhāḥ puruṣā ayatnasādhyā yoṣitaḥ
GS39kamasutu:1196: 5.1.2/.teṣu sādhyatvam anatyayaṃ gamyatvam āyatiṃ vṛttiṃ ca^ādita eva parīkṣeta//
GS39kamasutu:1197: 5.1.3/.yadā tu sthānāt sthāna^antaraṃ kāmaṃ pratipadyamānaṃ paśyet tad^ātma^śarīra^upaghāta^trāṇa^arthaṃ para^parigrahān abhyupagacchet//(p.255)
GS39kamasutu:1199: 5.1.5/.cakṣuḥ^prītir manaḥ^saṅgaḥ saṃkalpa^utpattir nidrā^ācchedas tanutā viṣayebhyo vyāvṛttir lajjā^praṇāśa unmādo mūrchā maraṇam iti teṣāṃ liṅgāni//(p.256)
GS39kamasutu:1200: 5.1.6/.tatra^ākṛtito lakṣaṇataś ca yuvatyāḥ śīlaṃ satyaṃ śaucaṃ sādhyatāṃ caṇḍa^vegatāṃ ca lakṣayed ity ācāryāḥ//(p.256)
GS39kamasutu:1201: 5.1.7/.vyabhicārād ākṛti^lakṣaṇa^yogānām iṅgita^ākārābhyām eva pravṛttir boddhavyā yoṣita iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.256)
GS39kamasutu:1202: 5.1.8/.yaṃ kaṃ cid ujjvalaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā strī kāmayate/ tathā puruṣo +api yoṣitam/ apekṣayā tu na *pravartata[ch:
GS39kamasutu:1205: 5.1.10/.na strī dharmam adharmaṃ ca^apekṣate kāmayata eva/ kārya^apekṣayā tu na^abhiyuṅkte/
GS39kamasutu:1208: 5.1.13/.puruṣas tu dharma^sthitim ārya^samayaṃ ca^apekṣya kāmayamāno +api vyāvartate/
GS39kamasutu:1210: 5.1.15/.niṣkāraṇam abhiyuṅkte/ abhiyujyāpi punar na^abhiyuṅkte/ siddhāyāṃ ca mādhyasthyaṃ gacchati/
GS39kamasutu:1245_1: bālyāt prabhṛti saṃsṛṣṭaḥ pravṛddha^yauvanaḥ krīḍana^karma^ādinā^āgata^viśvāsaḥ preṣaṇasya
GS39kamasutu:1245_2: kartā^ucita^saṃbhāṣaṇaḥ priyasya kartā^anyasya bhūta^pūrvo dūto marmajña uttamayā
GS39kamasutu:1245_3: prārthitaḥ sakhyā pracchannaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaḥ subhaga^abhikhyātaḥ saha saṃvṛddhaḥ prātiveśyaḥ
GS39kamasutu:1247: nava^varakaḥ prekṣa^udyāna^tyāga^śīlo vṛṣa iti siddha^pratāpaḥ sāhasikaḥ śūro vidyā^rūpa^guṇa^upabhogaiḥ patyur atiśayitā mahārha^veṣa^upacāraś ca^iti//(p.261)
GS39kamasutu:1249_2: prekṣitā pārśva^vilokinī / niṣkāraṇaṃ sapatnyādhivinnā / bhartṛ^dveṣiṇī vidviṣṭā
GS39kamasutu:1250_1: mṛta^patikā bālā / daridrā bahu^upabhogā / jyeṣṭha^bhāryā bahu^devarakā / bahu^māninī
GS39kamasutu:1250_2: nyūna^bhartṛkā / kauśala^abhimāninī bhartur maurkhyeṇa^udvignā / aviśeṣatayā lobhena /
GS39kamasutu:1251_0: 5.1.54 /.kanyā^kāle yatnena varitā kathaṃ cid alabdha^abhiyuktā ca sā tadānīṃ samāna^buddhi^śīla^medhā^pratipatti^sātmyā /
GS39kamasutu:1251_1: prakṛtyā pakṣa^pātinī / anaparādhe vimānitā / tulya^rūpābhiś ca^adhaḥ kṛtā / proṣita^patikā^iti /
GS39kamasutu:1258: 5.2.1/.yathā^kanyā svayam abhiyoga^sādhyā na tathā dūtyā/ para^striyas tu sūkṣma^bhāvā dūtī^sādhyā na tathā^ātmanā^ity ācāryāḥ//(p.265)
GS39kamasutu:1259: 5.2.2/.sarvatra śakti^viṣaye svayaṃ sādhanam upapannatarakaṃ durupapādatvāt tasya dūtī^prayoga iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.265)
GS39kamasutu:1260: 5.2.3/.prathama^sāhasā aniyantraṇa^saṃbhāṣāś ca svayaṃ pratāryāḥ/ tad^viparītāś ca dūtyā^iti prāyo^vādaḥ//(p.265)
GS39kamasutu:1261: 5.2.4/.svayam abhiyokṣyamāṇas tv ādāv eva paricayaṃ kuryāt//(p.265)
GS39kamasutu:1264_0: 5.2.7 /.darśane ca^asyāḥ satataṃ sākāraṃ prekṣaṇaṃ keśa^saṃyamanaṃ nakhāc churaṇam
GS39kamasutu:1264_1: ābharaṇa^prahlādanam adhara^oṣṭha^vimardanaṃ tās tāś ca līlā vayasyaiḥ saha prekṣamāṇāyās
GS39kamasutu:1264_2: tat^saṃbaddhāḥ para^apadeśinyaś ca kathās tyāga^upabhoga^prakāśanaṃ sakhyur utsaṅga^niṣaṇṇasya
GS39kamasutu:1264_3: sāṅga^bhaṅgaṃ jṛṃbhaṇam ekabhrū^kṣepaṇaṃ manda^vākyatā tad^vākya^śravaṇaṃ tām uddiśya
GS39kamasutu:1265_0: bālena^anya^janena vā sahānya^upadiṣṭā dvyarthā kathā tasyāṃ svayaṃ manoratha^avedanam
GS39kamasutu:1265_1: anya^apadeśena tām eva^uddiśya bāla^cumbanam āliṅganaṃ ca jihvayā ca^asya tāmbūla^dānaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1265_2: pradeśinyā hanu^deśa^ghaṭṭanaṃ tat tad yathā^yogaṃ yathā^avakāśaṃ ca prayoktavyam /
GS39kamasutu:1266_0: 5.2.8 /.tasyāś ca^aṅkagatasya bālasya lālanaṃ bāla^krīḍanakānāṃ ca^asya dānaṃ grahaṇaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1266_1: tena saṃnikṛṣṭatvāt kathā^yojanaṃ tat^saṃbhāṣaṇa^kṣameṇa janena ca prītim āsādya
GS39kamasutu:1266_2: kāryaṃ tad^anubandhaṃ ca gamana^agamanasya yojanaṃ saṃśraye ca^asyās tām apaśyato
GS39kamasutu:1267: 5.2.9/.prasṛte tu paricaye tasyā haste nyāsaṃ nikṣepaṃ ca nidadhyāt/ tat^prati^dinaṃ prati^kṣaṇaṃ ca^eka^deśato gṛhnīyāt/ saugandhikaṃ pūga^phalāni ca/
GS39kamasutu:1268: 5.2.10/.tām ātmano dāraiḥ saha visrambha^goṣṭhyāṃ vivikta^āsane ca yojayet
GS39kamasutu:1270: 5.2.12/.suvarṇakāra^maṇikāra^vaikaṭika^nīlīkusumbha^rañjka^ādiṣu ca kāma^arthinyāṃ saha^ātmano vaśyaiś ca^eṣāṃ tat^saṃpādane svayaṃ prayateta/
GS39kamasutu:1273: 5.1.15/.yena karmaṇā dravyeṇa kauśalena ca^arthinī syāt tasya prayogam utpattim āgamam upāyaṃ vijñānaṃ ca^ātma^āyattaṃ darśayet/
GS39kamasutu:1274: 5.2.16/.pūrva^pravṛtteṣu loka^cariteṣu dravya^guṇa^parīkṣāsu ca tayā tat^parijanena ca saha vivādaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1275: 5.2.17/.tatra nirdiṣṭāni paṇitāni teṣv enāṃ prāśnikatvena yojayet/
GS39kamasutu:1276: 5.2.18/.tayā tu vivadamāno +atyantād bhutam iti brūyād iti paricaya^kāraṇāni//(p.268)
GS39kamasutu:1277_1: prāyeṇa tatra sūkṣmā abhiyogāḥ / kanyānām asaṃprayuktatvāt / itarāsu tān eva sphuṭam
GS39kamasutu:1280: omits] syād aṅgulīyakaṃ ca/ tad^dhastād gṛhīta^tāmbūlayā goṣṭhī^gamana^udyatasya keśa^hasta^puṣpa^yācanam/
GS39kamasutu:1283: 5.2.24/.krameṇa ca vivikta^deśe gamanam āliṅganaṃ cumbanaṃ tāmbūlasya grāhaṇaṃ dāna^ante dravyāṇāṃ parivartanaṃ guhya^deśa^abhimarśanaṃ ca^ity abhiyogāḥ//(p.270)
GS39kamasutu:1284: 5.2.25/.yatra ca^eka^abhiyuktā na tatra^aparām abhiyuñjīta/ tatra yā vṛddha^anubhūta^viṣayā priya^upagrahaiś ca tām upagṛhṇīyāt//(p.270)
GS39kamasutu:1287: 5.2.27cd/.na tatra yoṣitaṃ kāṃ cit suprāpām api laṅghayet//(p.270)
GS39kamasutu:1291: 5.3.1/.abhiyuñjāno yoṣitaḥ pravṛttiṃ parīkṣeta/ tayā bhāvaḥ parīkṣito bhavati/ abhiyogāṃś ca pratigṛhṇīyāt//(p.271)
GS39kamasutu:1293: 5.3.3/.apratigṛhya^abhiyogaṃ punar api saṃsṛjyamānāṃ dvidhā bhūta^mānasāṃ vidyāt/ tāṃ krameṇa sādhayet//(p.271)
GS39kamasutu:1294: 5.3.4/.apratigṛhya^abhiyogaṃ saviśeṣam alaṃkṛtā ca punar dṛśyeta tathā^eva tam abhigacchec ca vivikte balād grahaṇīyāṃ vidyāt//(p.271)
GS39kamasutu:1295: 5.3.5/.bahūn api viṣa^hate +abhiyogān na ca cireṇa^api prayacchaty ātmānaṃ sā śuṣka^pratigrāhiṇī paricaya^vighaṭana^sādhyā//(p.272)
GS39kamasutu:1297: 5.3.7/.abhiyukta^api pariharati/ na ca saṃsṛjyate/ na ca pratyācaṣṭe/ tasminn ātmani ca gaurava^abhimānāt/ sa^atiparicayāt kṛcchra^sādhyā/ marmajñayā dūtyā tāṃ sādhayet//(p.272)
GS39kamasutu:1300: 5.3.10/.kāraṇāt saṃsparśanaṃ sahate na^avabudhyate nāma dvidhā^bhūta^mānasā sātatyena kṣāntyā vā sādhyā/(p.273)
GS39kamasutu:1301: 5.3.11/.samīpe śayānāyāḥ supto nāma karam upari vinyaset/ sāpi suptā^iva^upekṣate/ jāgratī tv apanuded bhūyo +abhiyoga^ākāṅkṣiṇī//(p.273)
GS39kamasutu:1304: 5.3.14/.tad^asahamānām utthitāṃ dvitīye +ahani prakṛti^vartinīm abhiyoga^arthinīṃ vidyāt/ adṛśyamānāṃ tu dūtī^sādhyām//(p.273)
GS39kamasutu:1305: 5.3.15/.ciram adṛṣṭā^api prakṛtisthā^eva saṃsṛjyate kṛta^lakṣaṇāṃ tāṃ darśita^ākārām upakramet//(p.274)
GS39kamasutu:1306_1: vadati / svinna^kara^caraṇa^aṅguliḥ svinna^mukhī ca bhavati / śiraḥ^pīḍane saṃvāhane
GS39kamasutu:1307: 5.3.17/.āturā saṃvāhikā ca^ekena hastena saṃvāhayantī dvitīyena bāhunā sparśam āvedayati śleṣayati ca/ vismita^bhāvā/
GS39kamasutu:1308_0: 5.3.18 /.nidrā^andhā vā parispṛśya^ūrubhyāṃ bāhubhyām api tiṣṭhati / ali^kaika^deśam
GS39kamasutu:1308_1: ūrvor upari pātayati / ūrū^mūla^saṃvāhane niyuktā na pratilomayati / tatra^eva hastam
GS39kamasutu:1308_2: ekam avicalaṃ nyasyati / aṅga^saṃdaṃśena ca pīḍitaṃ cirād apanayati /
GS39kamasutu:1311: 5.3.21/.vivikte bhāvaṃ darśayati niṣkāraṇaṃ ca^agūḍham anyatra pracchanna^pradeśāt/
GS39kamasutu:1312: 5.3.22/.saṃnikṛṣṭa^paricāraka^upabhogyā sā ced ākāritā^api tathā^eva syāt sā marmajñayā dūtyā sādhyā/
GS39kamasutu:1313: 5.3.23/.vyāvartamānā tu tarkaṇīyā^iti bhāva^parīkṣā//(p.274) bhavanti ca^atra ślokāḥ ---(p.275)
GS39kamasutu:1319: 5.3.26cd/.kṣipram eva^abhiyojyā sā prathame tv eva darśane//(p.275)
GS39kamasutu:1320: 5.3.27ab/.ślakṣṇam ākāritā yā tu darśayet sphuṭam uttaram/(p.275)
GS39kamasutu:1323: 5.3.28cd/.eṣa sūkṣmo vidhiḥ proktaḥ siddhā eva sphuṭaṃ striyaḥ//(p.276)
GS39kamasutu:1326_1: kavi^kathābhiḥ pāra^dārika^kathābhiś ca tasyāś ca rūpa^vijñāna^dākṣiṇya^śīla^anupraśaṃsābhiś ca tāṃ rañjayet /
GS39kamasutu:1327: 5.4.3/.katham evaṃ vidhāyās tava^ayam ithaṃbhūtaḥ patir^iti ca^anuśayaṃ grāhayet/
GS39kamasutu:1328: 5.4.4/.na tava subhage dāsyam api kartuṃ yukta iti brūyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1329: 5.4.5/.manda^vegatām īrṣyālutāṃ śaṭhatām akṛtajñatāṃ ca^asaṃbhoga^śīlatāṃ kadaryatāṃ capalatām anyāni ca yāni tasmin guptāny asyā abhyāśe sati sadbhāve +atiśayena bhāṣeta/
GS39kamasutu:1333: 5.4.9/.nāyikāyā eva tu viśvāsyatām upalabhya dūtītvena^upasarpayet prathama^sāhasāyāṃ sūkṣma^bhāvāyāṃ ca^iti goṇikāputraḥ//(p.277)
GS39kamasutu:1334: 5.4.10/.sā nāyakasya caritam anulomatāṃ kāmitāni ca kathayet/
GS39kamasutu:1337_0: tvāṃ kila dṛṣṭvā^amutra^asāv itthaṃ gotra^putro nāyakaś citta^unmādam anubhavati /
GS39kamasutu:1337_1: prakṛtyā sukumāraḥ kadā cid anyatra^aparikliṣṭa^pūrvas tapasvī / tato +adhunā śakyam
GS39kamasutu:1337_2: anena maraṇam apy anubhavitum iti varṇayet /
GS39kamasutu:1338: 5.4.13/.tatra siddhā dvitīye +ahani vāci vaktre dṛṣṭyāṃ ca prasādam upalakṣya punar api kathāṃ pravartayet/
GS39kamasutu:1339: 5.4.14/.śṛṇvatyāṃ ca^ahalyā^avimāraka^śākuntalā^ādīny anyāny api laukikāni ca kathayet tad^yuktāni/
GS39kamasutu:1341: ca^asya pracchannaṃ saṃprayogaṃ bhūtam abhūta^pūrvaṃ vā varṇayet/
GS39kamasutu:1345: 5.4.19/.kvāsitaṃ kva śayitaṃ *kva[ch:omits] bhuktaṃ kva ceṣṭitaṃ kiṃ vā kṛtam iti pṛcchati/
GS39kamasutu:1352: 5.4.26/.sādhuvādinī satī kim idam aśobhanam abhidhatsa iti kathām anubadhnāti/
GS39kamasutu:1354: 5.4.28/.pūrva^pravṛttaṃ ca tat^saṃdarśanaṃ kathā^abhiyogaṃ ca svayam akathayantī tayā^ucyamānam ākāṅkṣati/
GS39kamasutu:1355: 5.4.29/.nāyaka^manoratheṣu ca kathyamāneṣu saparibhavaṃ nāma hasati/ na ca nirvadati^iti//(p.279)
GS39kamasutu:1362: 5.4.36/.tāsāṃ manoharāṇy upāyanāni tāmbūlam anulepanaṃ srajam aṅgulīyakaṃ vāso vā tena prahitaṃ darśayet/
GS39kamasutu:1363: 5.4.37/.teṣu nāyakasya yathā^arthaṃ nakha^daśana^padāni tāni tāni ca cihnāni syuḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1365: 5.4.39/.pattra^chedyāni nānā^abhiprāya^ākṛtini darśayet/ lekha^patra^garbhāṇi karṇa^pattrāṇy āpīḍāṃś ca
GS39kamasutu:1368_0: 5.4.42 /.sa tu devatā^abhigamane yātrāyām udyāna^krīḍāyāṃ jala^avataraṇe vivāhe yajña^vyasana^utsaveṣv
GS39kamasutu:1368_1: agny^utpāte caura^vibhrame janapadasya cakra^ārohaṇe prekṣā^vyāpāreṣu teṣu teṣu ca
GS39kamasutu:1370: 5.4.44/.tasyā eva tu gehe vidita^niṣkrama^praveśe cintitā^atyaya^pratīkāre praveśanam upapannaṃ niṣkramaṇam avijñāta^kālaṃ ca tan nityaṃ sukha^upāyaṃ ca^iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.282)
GS39kamasutu:1371: 5.4.45/.nisṛṣṭa^arthā parimita^arthā patra^hārī svayaṃ^dūtī mūḍha^dūtī bhāryā^dūtī mūka^dūtī vāta^dūtī ca^iti dūtī^viśeṣāḥ//(p.282)
GS39kamasutu:1372: 5.4.46/.nāyakasya nāyikāyāś ca yathā^manīṣitam artham upalabhya sva^buddhyā kārya^saṃpādinī nisṛṣṭa^arthā//(p.282)
GS39kamasutu:1375: 5.4.49/.kautukāc ca^anurūpau yuktāv imau parasparasya^ity asaṃstutayor api//(p.283)
GS39kamasutu:1380_0: 5.4.54 /.dautyena prahita^anyayā svayam eva nāyakam abhigacched ajānatī nāma tena
GS39kamasutu:1380_1: saha^upabhogaṃ svapne vā kathayet / gotra^skhalitaṃ bhāryāṃ ca^asya nindet / tad^vyapadeśena
GS39kamasutu:1380_2: svayam īrṣyāṃ darśayet / nakha^daśana^cihnitaṃ vā kiṃ cid dadyāt / bhavate +aham
GS39kamasutu:1380_3: adau dātuṃ saṃkalpitā^iti ca^abhidadhīta / mama bhāryāyā kā ramanīyā^iti vivikte
GS39kamasutu:1382: 5.4.56/.pratigraha^cchalena^anyām abhisaṃdhāya^asyāḥ saṃdeśa^śrāvaṇa^dvāreṇa nāyakaṃ sādhayet tāṃ ca^upahanyāt sā^api svayaṃ^dūtī/
GS39kamasutu:1384_1: pṛcchet / yogāñ śikṣayet / sākāraṃ maṇḍayet / kopam enāṃ grāhayet / evaṃ ca pratipadyasva^iti
GS39kamasutu:1384_2: śrāvayet / svayaṃ ca^asyāṃ nakha^daśana^padāni nirvartayet / tena dvāreṇa nāyakam
GS39kamasutu:1386: 5.4.60/.sva^bhāryāṃ vā mūḍhāṃ prayojya tayā saha viśvāsena yojayitvā tayā^eva^ākārayet/ ātmanaś ca vaicakṣaṇyaṃ prakāśayet/ sā bhāryā dūtī/ tasyās tayā^eva^ākāra^grahaṇam//(p.285)
GS39kamasutu:1387_0: 5.4.61 /.bālāṃ vā paricārikām adoṣajñām aduṣṭena^upāyena prahiṇuyāt / tatra sraji
GS39kamasutu:1387_1: karṇa^pattre vā gūḍha^lekha^nidhānaṃ nakha^daśana^padaṃ vā sā mūka^dūtī / tasyās
GS39kamasutu:1388_1: dvyarthaṃ vā vacanam udāsīnā yā śrāvayet sā vāta^dūtī / tasyā api tayā^eva pratyuttara^prārthanam
GS39kamasutu:1399: 5.5.1/.na rājñāṃ mahāmātrāṇāṃ vā parabhavana^praveśo vidyate/ mahājanena hi caritam eṣāṃ dṛśyate +anuvidhīyate ca//(p.288)
GS39kamasutu:1400: 5.5.2/.savitāram udyantaṃ trayo lokāḥ paśyanti anūdyante ca/ gacchantam api paśyanty anupratiṣṭhante ca//(p.288)
GS39kamasutu:1401: 5.5.3/.tasmād aśakyatvād garhaṇīyatvāc ca^iti na te vṛthā kiṃ cid ācareyuḥ//(p.288)
GS39kamasutu:1403: 5.5.5/.grāma^adhipater ayuktakasya hala^uttha^vṛtti^putrasya yūno grāmīṇa^yoṣito vacana^mātra^sādhyāḥ/ tāś carṣaṇya ity ācakṣate viṭāḥ//(p.289)
GS39kamasutu:1404_2: dravyāṇāṃ kraya^vikraya^vinimayeṣu teṣu teṣu ca karmasu saṃprayogaḥ //(p.289)
GS39kamasutu:1411_1: pṛthag bhoga^avāsakān praviśya kathābhir āsitvā pūjitāḥ prapītāś ca^upapradoṣaṃ niṣkrāmayeyuḥ //(p.290)
GS39kamasutu:1412: 5.5.13/.tatra praṇihitā rāja^dāsī prayojyāyāḥ pūrva^saṃsṛṣṭā tāṃ tatra (p.290) saṃbhāṣeta/
GS39kamasutu:1414: 5.5.15/.prāg eva svabhavanasthāṃ brūyāt/ amuṣyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ tava rāja^bhavana^sthānāni rāmanīyakāni darśayiṣyāmi^iti kāle ca yojayet/ bahiḥ pravāla^kuṭṭimaṃ te darśayiṣyāmi/
GS39kamasutu:1415_1: citra^karmāṇi krīḍā^mṛgān yantrāṇi śakunān vyāghra^siṃha^pañjara^ādīni ca yāni purastād varṇitāni syuḥ /
GS39kamasutu:1419: 5.5.20/.apratipadyamānāṃ svayam eva^īśvara āgatya^upacāraiḥ sānvitāṃ rañjayitvā saṃbhūya ca sa^anurāgaṃ visṛjet/
GS39kamasutu:1420: 5.5.21/.prayojyāyāś ca patyur anugraha^ucitasya dārān nityam antaḥpuram aucityāt praveśayet/ tatra praṇihitā (p.291)
GS39kamasutu:1422_0: 5.5.22 /.antaḥpurikā vā prayojyayā saha svaceṭikā saṃpreṣaṇena prītiṃ kuryāt / prasṛta^prītiṃ
GS39kamasutu:1422_1: ca sa^apadeśaṃ darśane niyojayet / praviṣṭāṃ pūjitāṃ pīta^vartīm praṇihitā rāja^dāsī^iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa /
GS39kamasutu:1423: 5.5.23/.yasmin vā vijñāne prayojyā vikhyātā syāt tad darśana^artham antaḥpurikā sa^upacāraṃ tām āhvayet/ praviṣṭāṃ praṇihitā rāja^dāsī^iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa/
GS39kamasutu:1424_0: 5.5.24 /.udbhūtān arthasya bhītasya vā bhāryāṃ bhikṣukī brūyāt asāv antaḥpurikā rājani
GS39kamasutu:1424_1: siddhā gṛhīta^vākyā mama vacanaṃ śṛṇoti / svabhāvataś ca kṛpā^śīlā tām anena^upāyena^adhigamiṣyāmi /
GS39kamasutu:1424_2: aham eva te praveśaṃ kārayiṣyāmi / sā ca te bhartur mahā^antam anarthaṃ nivartayiṣyati^iti
GS39kamasutu:1424_3: pratipannāṃ dvis trir iti praveśayet / antaḥpurikā ca^asyā abhayaṃ dadyāt / abhaya^śravaṇāc
GS39kamasutu:1425: ca saṃprahṛṣṭāṃ praṇihitā rāja^dāsī^iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa/
GS39kamasutu:1426: 5.5.25/.etayā vṛtty^arthināṃ mahāmātra^abhitaptānāṃ balād vigṛhītānāṃ vyavahāre durbalānāṃ sva^bhogena^asaṃtuṣṭānāṃ rājani prīti^kāmānāṃ rājya^janeṣu paṅkti(vyakti)
GS39kamasutu:1427: m icchatāṃ sajātair bādhyamānānāṃ sajātān bādhitukāmānāṃ sūcakānām anyeṣāṃ kārya^vaśināṃ jāyā vyākhyātāḥ//(p.292)
GS39kamasutu:1428: 5.5.26/.anyena vā prayojyāṃ saha saṃsṛṣṭāṃ saṃgrāhya dāsyam upanītāṃ krameṇa^antaḥpuraṃ praveśayet/
GS39kamasutu:1429: 5.5.27/.praṇidhinā ca^āyatim asyāḥ saṃdūṣya rājani vidviṣṭa iti kalatra^avagraha^upāyena^enām antaḥpuraṃ praveśayed iti pracchanna^yogāḥ/ ete rāja^putreṣu prāyeṇa//(p.293)
GS39kamasutu:1431: 5.5.29/.ābhīraṃ hi koṭṭa^rājaṃ para^bhavana^gataṃ bhrātṛ^prayukto rajako jaghāna/ kāśirājaṃ jayasenam aśva^adhyakṣa iti//(p.294)
GS39kamasutu:1433: 5.5.31/.prattā janapada^kanyā daśame +ahani kiṃcid aupāyanikam upagṛhya praviśanty antaḥpuram upabhuktā eva visṛjyanta ity āndhrāṇām/
GS39kamasutu:1434: 5.5.32/.mahāmātra^iṣvarāṇām antaḥpurāṇi niśi sevā^arthaṃ rājānam upagacchanti vātsagulmakānām/
GS39kamasutu:1435: 5.5.33/.rūpavatīr janapada^yoṣitaḥ prīty^apadeśena māsaṃ māsā^ardhaṃ vā^ativāsayanty antaḥpurikā vaidarbhāṇām/
GS39kamasutu:1436: 5.5.34/.darśanīyāḥ svabhāryāḥ prīti^dāyām eva mahāmātra^rājabhyo dadaty aparāntakānām/
GS39kamasutu:1438: nagara^striyo janapada^striyaś ca saṅghaśa ekaśaś ca rāja^kulaṃ praviśanti saurāṣṭrakāṇām iti//(p.295)
GS39kamasutu:1442: 5.5.37ab/.na tv eva^etān prayuñjīta rājā lokahite rataḥ/(p.295)
GS39kamasutu:1445: 5.6.1/.na^antaḥpurāṇāṃ rakṣaṇa^yogāt puruṣa^saṃdarśanaṃ vidyate patyuś ca^ekatvād aneka^sādhāraṇatvāc ca^atṛptiḥ/ tasmāt tāni prayogata eva parasparaṃ rañjayeyuḥ//(p.296)
GS39kamasutu:1446: 5.6.2/.dhātreyikāṃ sakhīṃ dāsīṃ vā puruṣavad alaṃkṛtya^ākṛtisaṃyuktaiḥ kanda^mūla^phala^avayavair apadravyair vā^ātma^abhiprāyāṃ nirvartayeyuḥ//(p.296)
GS39kamasutu:1448_0: 5.6.4 /.rājānaś ca kṛpā^śīlā vinā^api bhāva^yogād āyojita^apadravyā yāvad artham
GS39kamasutu:1448_1: ekayā rātryā bahvībhir api gacchanti / yasyāṃ tu prītir vāsaka ṛtuv vā tatra^abhiprāyataḥ
GS39kamasutu:1449: 5.6.5/.strī^yogeṇa^eva puruṣāṇām apy alabdha^vṛttīnāṃ viyoniṣu vijātiṣu strī^pratimāsu kevala^upamardanāc ca^abhiprāya^nivṛttir vyākhyātā//(p.297)
GS39kamasutu:1450: 5.6.6/.yoṣav eṣāṃś ca nāgarakān prayeṇa antaḥpurikāḥ paricārikābhiḥ saha praveśayanti/
GS39kamasutu:1451: 5.6.7/.teṣām upāvartane dhātreyikāś ca abhyantara^saṃsṛṣṭā āyatiṃ darśayantyaḥ prayateran/
GS39kamasutu:1452: 5.6.8/.sukha^praveśitām apasāra^bhūmiṃ viśālatāṃ veśmanaḥ pramādaṃ rakṣiṇām anityatāṃ parijanasya varṇayeyuḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1454: 5.6.10/.nāgārakas tu suprāpam apy antaḥpuram apāya^bhūyiṣṭhatvān na praviśed iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.298)
GS39kamasutu:1455_1: proṣitā^rājakaṃ kāraṇāni samīkṣya bahuśa āhūyamāno +artha^buddhyā kakṣyā^praveśaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1455_2: ca dṛṣṭvā tābhir eva vihita^upāyaḥ praviśet /
GS39kamasutu:1457: 5.6.13/.bahiś ca rakṣibhir anyad eva kāraṇam apadiśya saṃsṛjyeta/
GS39kamasutu:1458: 5.6.14/.antaś^cāriṇyāṃ ca paricārikāyāṃ vidita^arthāyāṃ saktam ātmānaṃ rūpayet/ tad alābhāc ca śokam antaḥpraveśinībhiś ca dūtī^kalpaṃ sakalam ācaret/ (p.298)
GS39kamasutu:1460: 5.6.16/.dūtyās tv asaṃcāre yatra gṛhīta^ākārāyāḥ prayojyāyā darśana^yogas tatra^avasthānam/
GS39kamasutu:1463: 5.6.19/.yatra saṃpāto +asyās tatra citra^karmaṇas tad yuktasya vyarthānāṃ gīta^vastukānāṃ krīḍanakānāṃ kṛta^cihnānām āpīnakānā(kasya)
GS39kamasutu:1465: 5.6.20/.pratyuttaraṃ tayā dattaṃ prapaśyet/ tataḥ praveśane yateta//(p.299)
GS39kamasutu:1466: 5.6.21/.yatra ca^asyā niyataṃ gamanam iti vidyāt tatra pracchannasya prāg eva^avasthānam/
GS39kamasutu:1470_1: pacet / tato +añjanena samabhāgena peṣayet / anena^abhyakta^nayano naṣṭa^cchāyā^rūpaś
GS39kamasutu:1471: 5.6.26/.rātri^kaumudīṣu ca dīpikā^saṃbādhe suraṅgayā vā//(p.300) tatra^etad bhavati ---(p.300)
GS39kamasutu:1482: 5.6.29/.tatra rāja^kula^cāriṇya eva lakṣaṇyān puruṣān antaḥpuraṃ praveśayanti na^atisurakṣatvād āparāntikānām/
GS39kamasutu:1485: 5.6.32/.svair eva putrair antaḥpurāṇi kāmacārair jananī^varjam upayujyante vaidarbhakāṇām/
GS39kamasutu:1486: 5.6.33/.tathā praveśibhir eva jñātisaṃbandhibhir na^anyair upayujyante strairājakānām/
GS39kamasutu:1488: 5.6.35/.parispandāḥ karma^karāś ca^antaḥpureṣv aniṣiddhā anye +api tad^rūpāś ca saindhavānām/
GS39kamasutu:1489: 5.6.36/.arthena rakṣiṇam upagṛhya sāhasikāḥ saṃhatāḥ praviśanti haimavatānām/
GS39kamasutu:1490: 5.6.37/.puṣpa^dāna^niyogān nagara^brāhmaṇā rāja^viditam antaḥpurāṇi gacchanti/ paṭa^antaritaiś ca^eṣām ālāpaḥ/ tena prasaṅgena vyatikaro bhavati vaṅga^aṅga^kaliṅgakānām/
GS39kamasutu:1492: yuvānaṃ pracchādayanti prācyānām iti/ evaṃ para^striyaḥ prakurvīta/ ity antaḥpurikā^vṛttam//(p.302)
GS39kamasutu:1495: 5.6.41/.te hi bhayena ca^arthena ca^anyaṃ prayojayeyus tasmāt kāma^bhaya^artha^upadhā^śuddhān iti goṇikāputraḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1496: 5.6.42/.adroho dharmas tam api bhayāj jahyād ato dharma^bhaya^upadhā^śuddhān iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.303)
GS39kamasutu:1497: 5.6.43/.para^vākya^abhidhāyinībhiś ca gūḍha^ākārābhiḥ pramadābhir ātmadārān upadadhyāc chauca^aśauca^parijñāna^artham iti bābhravīyāḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1498: 5.6.44/.duṣṭānāṃ yuvatiṣu siddhatvān na^akasmād aduṣṭa^dūṣaṇam ācared iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.303)
GS39kamasutu:1499_0: 5.6.45 /.atigoṣṭhī niraṅkuśatvaṃ bhartuḥ svairatā puruṣaiḥ saha^aniyantraṇatā / pravāse
GS39kamasutu:1499_1: +avasthānaṃ videśe nivāsaḥ svavṛtty^upaghātaḥ svairiṇī^saṃsargaḥ patyur īrṣyālutā
GS39kamasutu:1501: 5.6.46b/.na yāti cchalanāṃ kaścit svadārān prati śāstravit//(p.304)
GS39kamasutu:1514: 6.1.7/.nityam alaṃkāra^yoginī rāja^mārga^avalokinī dṛśyamānā na ca^ativivṛtā tiṣṭhet/ paṇya^sadharmatvāt//(p.306)
GS39kamasutu:1515: 6.1.8/.yair nāyakam āvarjayed anyābhyaś ca^avacchindyād ātmanaś ca^anarthaṃ pratikuryād arthaṃ ca sādhayen na ca gamyaiḥ paribhūyeta tān sahāyān kuryāt/
GS39kamasutu:1516_0: 6.1.9 /.te tv ārakṣaka^puruṣā dharma^adhikaraṇasthā daivajñā vikrāntāḥ śūrāḥ samāna^vidyāḥ
GS39kamasutu:1516_2: ās te ca te ca kārya^yogāt //(p.307)
GS39kamasutu:1517_0: 6.1.10 /.kevala^arthās tv amī gamyāḥ --- svatantraḥ pūrve vayasi vartamāno vittavān
GS39kamasutu:1517_1: aparokṣavṛttir adhikaraṇavān akṛcchra^adhigata^vittaḥ / saṃgharṣavān saṃtatāyaḥ subhaga^mānī
GS39kamasutu:1517_2: ślāghanakaḥ ṣaṇḍakaś ca puṃ^śabda^arthī / samāna^spardhī svabhāvatas tyāgī / rājani
GS39kamasutu:1519: savitta eka^putro liṅgī pracchanna^kāmaḥ śūro vaidyaś ca^iti//(p.308)
GS39kamasutu:1522_0: pragalbho vividha^śilpajño vṛddha^darśī sthūla^lakṣo mahā^utsāho dṛḍha^bhaktir anasūyakas
GS39kamasutu:1522_2: prāṇa^vāna^madyapo vṛṣo maitraḥ strīṇāṃ praṇetā lālayitā ca / na ca^āsāṃ vaśagaḥ svatantra^vṛttir
GS39kamasutu:1524_0: 6.1.13 /.nāyikāyāḥ punā rūpa^yauvana^lakṣaṇa^mādhurya yoginī guṇeṣv anuraktā na tathā^artheṣu
GS39kamasutu:1524_1: prīti^saṃyoga^śīlā sthiram atireka^jātīyā viśeṣa^arthinī nityam akadarya^vṛttir goṣṭhī^kalā^priyā
GS39kamasutu:1527_1: gurujana^parityaktaḥ steno dambha^śīlo mūla^karmaṇi prasakto māna^apamānayor anapekṣī
GS39kamasutu:1527_2: dveṣyair apy artha^hāryo vilajja ity agamyāḥ //(p.310)
GS39kamasutu:1528_0: 6.1.17 /.rāgo bhayam arthaḥ saṃgharṣo vaira^niryātanaṃ jijñāsā pakṣaḥ khedo gharmo
GS39kamasutu:1528_1: yaśo +anukampā suhṛd^vākyaṃ hrīḥ priya^sādṛśyaṃ dhanyatā rāga^apanayaḥ sājātyaṃ sāhaveśyaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1530: 6.1.19/.arthas tu prītyā na bādhitaḥ/ asya prādhānyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1532: 6.1.21/.upamantritā^api gamyena sahasā na pratijānīyāt/ puruṣāṇāṃ sulabha^avamānitvāt/
GS39kamasutu:1533: 6.1.22/.bhāva^jijñāsā^arthaṃ praicāraka^mukhān saṃvāhaka^gāyana^vaihāsikān gamye tadbhaktān vā praṇidadhyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1534: 6.1.23/.tad^abhāve pīṭhamarda^ādīn/ tebhyo nāyakasya śauca^aśaucaṃ rāga^aparāgau sakta^asaktāṃ dāna^adāne ca vidyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1536: 6.1.25/.lāvaka^kukkuṭa^meṣa^yuddha^śuka^śārikā^pralāpana^prekṣaṇaka^kalā^ vyapadeśena pīṭhamardo nāyakaṃ tasyā udavasitam ānayet/
GS39kamasutu:1538: 6.1.27/.āgatasya prīti^kautuka^jananaṃ kiṃ cid dravya^jātaṃ svayam idam asādhāraṇa^upabhogyam iti prīti^dāyaṃ dadyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1539: 6.1.28/.yatra ca ramate tayā goṣṭhya^enam upacāraiś ca rañjayet//(p.313)
GS39kamasutu:1540: 6.1.29/.gate ca saparihāsa^pralāpāṃ sa^upāyanāṃ paricārikām abhikṣṇaṃ preṣayet/
GS39kamasutu:1541: 6.1.30/.sapīṭhamardāyāś ca kāraṇa^apadeśena svayaṃ gamanam iti gamya^upāvartanam//(p.313)
GS39kamasutu:1548: 6.1.33cd/.gamyena saha saṃsṛṣṭā rañjayet taṃ tataḥ param//(p.314)
GS39kamasutu:1551: 6.2.2/.rañjayen na tu sajjeta saktavac ca viceṣṭeta^iti saṃkṣepa^uktiḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1556: 6.2.7/.tatra tu nāyikāyāḥ saṃtatam aratir nirvedo vrīḍā^bhayaṃ ca/
GS39kamasutu:1558: 6.2.9/.vyādhiṃ ca^ekam animittam ajugupsitam acakṣurgrāhyam anityaṃ ca khyāpayet/
GS39kamasutu:1560: 6.2.11/.nirmālyasya tu nāyikā ceṭikāṃ preṣayet tāmbūlasya ca//(p.315)
GS39kamasutu:1570: 6.2.21/.prekṣaṇam anya^manaskasya/ rāja^mārge ca prāsādasthāyās tatra viditāyā vrīḍā^śāṭhya^nāśaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1572: ratiḥ/ tam anu harṣa^śokau/ strīṣu jijñāsā/ kopaś ca^adīrghaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1578: 6.2.28/.tasmin bruvāṇe vākya^artha^grahaṇam/ tad^avadhārya praśaṃsā^viṣaye bhāṣaṇam/ tad^vākyasya ca^uttareṇa yojanam/ bhaktimāṃś cet/
GS39kamasutu:1580: 6.2.30/.niḥśvāse jṛmbhite skhalite patite vā tasya ca^ārtim āśaṃsīta/
GS39kamasutu:1588: 6.2.38/.tena saha deśa^mokṣaṃ rocayed rājani niṣkrayaṃ ca/(p.317)
GS39kamasutu:1592: 6.2.42/.gīte ca nāma^gotrayor grahaṇam/ glānyām urasi lalāṭe ca karaṃ kurvīta/ tat^sukham upalabhya nidrā^lābhaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1596: 6.2.46/.vratam upavāsaṃ ca^asya nirvartayet mayi doṣa iti/ aśakye svayam api tad^rūpā syāt/
GS39kamasutu:1604: 6.2.54/.sa eva ca me syād ity aurdhva^dehikeṣu vacanam/
GS39kamasutu:1608: 6.2.58/.balāt kāreṇa ca yady anyatra tayā nīyeta tadā viṣama^naśanaṃ śastraṃ rajjum iti kāmayeta/
GS39kamasutu:1609: 6.2.59/.pratyāyanaṃ ca praṇidhibhir nāyakasya/ svayaṃ vā^ātmano vṛtti^grahaṇam/
GS39kamasutu:1613: 6.2.63/.proṣite mṛjā^niyamaś ca^alaṃkārasya pratiṣedhaḥ/ maṅgalaṃ tv apekṣyam/ ekaṃ śaṅkha^valayaṃ vā dhārayet/
GS39kamasutu:1623: 6.2.73/.nisṛṣṭa^bhāvaḥ samāna^vṛttiḥ prayojana^kārī nirāśaṅko nirapekṣo +artheṣv iti sakta^lakṣaṇāni//(p.322)
GS39kamasutu:1624: 6.2.74/.tad etan nirdarśana^arthaṃ dattaka^śāsanād uktam/ anuktaṃ ca lokataḥ śīlayet puruṣa^prakṛtitaś ca//(p.322)
GS39kamasutu:1632: 6.3.2/.tatra svābhāvikaṃ saṃkalpāt samadhikaṃ vā labhamānā na^upāyān prayuñjīta^ity ācāryāḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1633: 6.3.3/.viditam apy upāyaiḥ pariṣkṛtaṃ dviguṇaṃ dāsyati^iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.324)
GS39kamasutu:1639: 6.3.9/.tathā yācita^alaṃkārāṇāṃ nāyaka^alaṃkārāṇāṃ ca tad^abhigamana^arthasya vyayasya praṇidhibhir nivedanam/
GS39kamasutu:1640: 6.3.10/.tad^artham ṛṇa^grahaṇam/ jananyā saha tad^udbhavasya vyayasya vivādaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1642: 6.3.12/.taiś ca pūrvam āhṛtā guravo +abhihārāḥ pūrvam (p.324)upanītāḥ pūrvaṃ śrāvitāḥ syuḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1647: 6.3.17/.gṛha^karma/ sakhyāḥ putrasya^utsañjanam dohado vyādhir mitrasya duḥkha^apanayanam iti/
GS39kamasutu:1649: 6.3.19/.tayā śīlitasya ca^alaṃkārasya bhāṇḍa^upaskarasya vā vaṇijo vikraya^arthaṃ darśanam/
GS39kamasutu:1650: 6.3.20/.pratigaṇikānāṃ ca sadṛśasya bhāṇḍasya vyatikare prativiśiṣṭasya grahaṇam/
GS39kamasutu:1653: 6.3.23/.tāsu nāyaka^samakṣam ātmano +abhyadhikaṃ lābhaṃ bhūtam abhūtaṃ vā vrīḍitā nāma varṇayet/
GS39kamasutu:1654: 6.3.24/.pūrva^yogināṃ ca lābha^atiśayena punaḥ saṃdhāne yatamānānām aviṣkṛtaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1657: 6.3.27/.viraktaṃ ca nityam eva prakṛti^vikriyāto vidyāt mukha^varṇāc ca//(p.328)
GS39kamasutu:1666: 6.3.36/.tasya sāra^dravyāṇi prāg avabodhād anya^apadeśena haste kurvīta/
GS39kamasutu:1671_1: avijñāta^viṣayasya saṃkathā / tad^vijñāteṣv avismayaḥ *kutsā ca / darpa^vighātaḥ /
GS39kamasutu:1673_1: jugupsā / parisvaṅge bhujamayyā sūcyā vyavadhānam / stabdhatā gātrāṇām / sakthnor
GS39kamasutu:1674: upalabhya codanā/ aśaktau hāsaḥ/ śaktāv anabhinandanam/ divā^api/ bhāvam upalabhya mahājana^abhigamanam//(p.331)
GS39kamasutu:1675_0: 6.3.43 /.vākyeṣu cchala^grahaṇam / anarmaṇi hāsaḥ / narmaṇi ca^anyam apadiśya hasati
GS39kamasutu:1675_1: vadati tasmin kaṭākṣeṇa parijanasya prekṣaṇaṃ tāḍanaṃ ca / āhatya ca^asya kathām
GS39kamasutu:1675_2: anyāḥ kathāḥ / tad^vyalīkānāṃ vyasanānāṃ ca^aparihāryāṇām anukīrtanam / marmaṇāṃ
GS39kamasutu:1676: 6.3.44/.āgate ca^adarśanam/ ayācya^yācanam/ ante svayaṃ mokṣaś ca^iti parigrahakasya^iti dattakasya//(p.331)
GS39kamasutu:1679: 6.3.45cd/.raktād arthasya ca^ādānam ante mokṣaś ca vaiśikam//(p.332)
GS39kamasutu:1684: 6.4.2/.sa ced avasita^artho vittavān sānu^rāgaś ca tataḥ saṃdheyaḥ//(p.333)
GS39kamasutu:1692: 6.4.10/.itas tataś ca svayam eva^apasṛtya^upajapati ced ubhayor guṇān apekṣī cala^buddhir asaṃdheyaḥ//(p.334)
GS39kamasutu:1693: 6.4.11/.itas tataś ca niṣkāsita^apasṛtaḥ sthira^buddhiḥ/ sa ced anyato bahu^labhamānayā niṣkāsitaḥ syāt sasāro +api tayā roṣito mama^amarṣād bahu dāsyati^iti saṃdheyaḥ//(p.335)
GS39kamasutu:1695: 6.4.13/.itaḥ svayam apasṛtas tato niṣkāsita^apasṛto yady atiriktam ādau ca dadyāt tataḥ pratigrāhyaḥ//(p.335)
GS39kamasutu:1696: 6.4.14/.itaḥ svayam apasṛtya tatra sthita upajapaṃs tarkayitavyaḥ//(p.335)
GS39kamasutu:1697_0: 6.4.15 /.viśeṣa^arthī ca^āgatas tato viśeṣam apaśyann āgantukāmo [mayi] māṃ jijñāsitukāmaḥ
GS39kamasutu:1697_1: sa āgatya sa^anurāgatvād dāsyati / tasyāṃ vā doṣān dṛṣṭvā mayi bhūyiṣṭhān guṇān adhunā
GS39kamasutu:1698: 6.4.16/.bālo vā na^ekatra^dṛṣṭir atisaṃdhāna^pradhāno vā haridrā^rāgo vā yat kiṃcana^kārī vā ity avetya saṃdadhyān na vā//(p.336)
GS39kamasutu:1699: 6.4.17/.ito niṣkāsita^apasṛtas tataḥ svayam apasṛta upajapaṃs tarkayitavyaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1700: 6.4.18/.anurāgād āgantukāmaḥ sa bahu dāsyati/ mama gunair bhāvito yo +anyasyāṃ na ramate//(p.336)
GS39kamasutu:1701_0: 6.4.19 /.pūrvam ayogena vā mayā niṣkāsitaḥ sa māṃ śīlayitvā vairaṃ niryātayitukāmo
GS39kamasutu:1701_1: dhanam abhiyogād vā mayā^asya^apahṛtaṃ tad^viśvāsya pratīpam ādātukāmo nirveṣṭukāmo
GS39kamasutu:1701_2: vā māṃ vartamāna^udbhedayitvā tyaktukāma ity akalyāṇa^buddhir asaṃdheyaḥ //(p.336)
GS39kamasutu:1703: 6.4.21/.ito niṣkāsitas tatra sthita upajapann etena vyākhyātaḥ//(p.337)
GS39kamasutu:1705: 6.4.23/.vyalīka^arthaṃ niṣkāsito mayāsāvan yatra gato yatnād ānetavyaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1708: 6.4.26/.artha^āgama^kālo vā^asya/ sthāna^vṛddhir asya jātā/ labdham anena^adhikaraṇam/ dārair viyuktaḥ/ pāra^tantryād vyāvṛttaḥ/ pitrā bhrātrā vā vibhaktaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1709: 6.4.27/.anena vā pratibaddham anena saṃdhiṃ kṛtvā nāyakaṃ dhaninam avāpsyāmi/
GS39kamasutu:1710: 6.4.28/.vimānito vā bhāryayā tam eva tasyāṃ vikramayiṣyāmi/
GS39kamasutu:1711: 6.4.29/.asya vā mitraṃ mad^dveṣiṇīṃ sapatnīṃ kāmayate tad amunā bhedayiṣyāmi/
GS39kamasutu:1713: 6.4.31/.tasya pīṭhamarda^ādayo mātur dauḥśīlyena nāyikāyāḥ saty apy anurāge (p.338)
GS39kamasutu:1718: 6.4.35/.apūrva^pūrva^saṃsṛṣṭayoḥ pūrva^saṃsṛṣṭaḥ śreyān/ sa hi vidita^śīlo dṛṣṭa^rāgaś ca sūpacāro bhavati^ity ācāryāḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1719: 6.4.36/.pūrva^saṃsṛṣṭaḥ sarvato niṣpīḍita^arthatvān na^atyartham arthado duḥkhaṃ ca punar^viśvāsayitum/ apūrvas tu sukhena^anurajyata iti vātsyāyanaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1721: 6.4.38ab/.anyāṃ bhedayituṃ gamyād anyato gamyam eva vā/(p.340)
GS39kamasutu:1724: 6.4.39cd/.atisaktaḥ pumān yatra bhayād bahu dadāti ca//(p.340)
GS39kamasutu:1729: 6.4.42ab/.saktaṃ tu vaśinaṃ nārī saṃbhāṣya^apy anyato vrajet/(p.340)
GS39kamasutu:1734: 6.5.1/.gamya^bāhulye bahu pratidinaṃ ca labhamānā na^ekaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt//(p.342)
GS39kamasutu:1735: 6.5.2/.deśaṃ kālaṃ sthitim ātmano guṇān saubhāgyaṃ ca^anyābhyo nyūna^atiriktatāṃ ca^avekṣya rajanyām arthaṃ sthāpayet//(p.342)
GS39kamasutu:1736: 6.5.3/.gamye dūtāṃś ca prayojayet/ tat^pratibaddhāṃś ca svayaṃ prahiṇuyāt//(p.342)
GS39kamasutu:1737: 6.5.4/.dvis triś catur iti lābhā^atiśaya^graha^artham ekasya^api gacchet/ parigrahaṃ ca caret//(p.342)
GS39kamasutu:1738: 6.5.5/.gamya^yaugapadye tu lābha^sāmye yad dravya^arthinī syāt tad dāyini viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣa ity ācāryāḥ//(p.343)
GS39kamasutu:1741: 6.5.8/.yat tatra sāmyād vā dravya^sāmye mitra^vākyād atipātitvād āyatito gamya^guṇataḥ prītitaś ca viśeṣaḥ//(p.343)
GS39kamasutu:1744: 6.5.11/.lubdho +api hi raktas tyajati na tu tyāgī nirbandhād rajyata iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.344)
GS39kamasutu:1745: 6.5.12/.tatra^api dhanavad^adhanavator dhanavati viśeṣaḥ/ tyāgi^prayojana^kartroḥ prayojana^kartari viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣa ity ācāryāḥ//(p.344)
GS39kamasutu:1746: 6.5.13/.prayojana^kartā sakṛt kṛtvā kṛtinam ātmānaṃ manyate tyāgī punar atītaṃ na^apekṣata iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.344)
GS39kamasutu:1749: 6.5.16/.ciram ārādhito +api tyāgī vyalīkam ekam upalabhya pratigaṇikayā vā mithyā^dūṣitaḥ śramam atītaṃ na^apekṣate/
GS39kamasutu:1750: 6.5.17/.prāyeṇa hi tejasvina ṛjavo +anādṛtāś ca tyāgino bhavanti/
GS39kamasutu:1751: 6.5.18/.kṛtajñas tu pūrva^śrama^apekṣī na sahasā virajyate/ parīkṣita^śīlatvāc ca na mithyā dūṣyata iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.345)
GS39kamasutu:1754: 6.5.21/.so +api hy artha^āgamo bhavitā/ mitraṃ tu sakṛd vākye pratihate kaluṣitaṃ syād iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.345)
GS39kamasutu:1756: 6.5.23/.tatra kārya^saṃdarśanena mitram anunīya śvobhūte vacanam astv iti tato +atipātinam arthaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt//(p.346)
GS39kamasutu:1759: anarthaḥ punaḥ sakṛt^prasṛto na jñāyate kva^avatiṣṭhata iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.346)
GS39kamasutu:1766: tad^vyaya^sahiṣṇor vā dhanasya parigrahaṇam ity uttama^gaṇikānāṃ lābha^atiśayaḥ//(p.347)
GS39kamasutu:1767: 6.5.29/.sārva^aṅgiko +alaṃkāra^yogo gṛhasya^udārasya karaṇam/ mahārhair bhāṇḍaiḥ paricārakaiś ca gṛha^paricchadasya^ujjvalata^iti rūpa^ājīvānāṃ lābhā^atiśayaḥ//(p.347)
GS39kamasutu:1768: 6.5.30/.nityaṃ śuklam ācchādanam apakṣudham anna^pānaṃ nityaṃ saugandhikena tāmbūlena ca yogaḥ sahiraṇya^bhāgam alaṃkaraṇam iti kumbha^dāsīnāṃ lābha^atiśayaḥ//(p.348)
GS39kamasutu:1769: 6.5.31/.etena pradeśena madhyama^adhamānām api lābha^atiśayān sarvāsām eva yojayed ity ācāryāḥ//(p.348)
GS39kamasutu:1771_0: 6.5.33 /.gamyam anyato nivārayitukāmā saktam anyasyām apahartukāmā vā anyāṃ vā lābhato
GS39kamasutu:1771_1: viyuyukṣamāṇa^agamya^saṃsargād ātmanaḥ sthānaṃ vṛddhim āyatim abhigamyatāṃ ca manyamānā
GS39kamasutu:1771_2: anartha^pratīkāre vā sāhāyam enaṃ kārayitukāmā saktasya vā ^anyasya vyalīka^arthinī
GS39kamasutu:1771_3: pūrva^upakāram akṛtam iva paśyantī kevala prīty^arthinī vā kalyāṇa^buddher alpam api lābhaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1773: 6.5.34/.āyaty^arthinī tu tam āśritya ca^anarthaṃ praticikīrṣantī naiva pratigṛhṇīyāt//(p.349)
GS39kamasutu:1777: sthāna^bhraṃśo vā^asya bhaviṣyati cala^cittaś ca^iti manyamānā tadātve tasmāl lābham icchet//(p.350)
GS39kamasutu:1778_0: 6.5.36 /.pratijñātam īśvareṇa pratigrahaṃ lapsyate adhikaraṇaṃ sthānaṃ vā prāpsyati
GS39kamasutu:1778_1: vṛtti^kālo +asya vā āsannaḥ vāhanam asyā gamiṣyati sthala^pattraṃ vā sasyam asya
GS39kamasutu:1778_2: pakṣyate kṛtam asmin na naśyati nityam avisaṃvādako vā^ity āyatyām icchet / parigraha^kalpaṃ vā^ācaret //(p.350)
GS39kamasutu:1781: 6.5.37cd/.āyātyāṃ ca tadātve ca dūrād eva vivarjayet//(p.351)
GS39kamasutu:1785: 6.5.39cd/.sthūla^lakṣān mahotsāhāṃs tān gacchet svair api vyayaiḥ//(p.351)
GS39kamasutu:1787: 6.6.1/.arthān ācaryamāṇān anarthā apy anūdbhavanty anubandhāḥ saṃśayāś ca//(p.352)
GS39kamasutu:1788: 6.6.2/.te buddhi^daurbalyād atirāgād atyabhimānād atidambhād atyārjavād ativiśvāsād atikrodhāt pramādāt sāhasād daivayogāc ca syuḥ//(p.352)
GS39kamasutu:1789: 6.6.3/.teṣāṃ phalaṃ kṛtasya vyayasya niṣphalatvam anāyatirāgam iṣyato +arthasya nivartanam āptasya niṣkramaṇaṃ pāruṣyasya prāptir gamyatā śarīrasya (p.352)
GS39kamasutu:1791: 6.6.4/.tasmāt tān ādita eva parijihīrṣed arthabhūyiṣṭhāṃś ca^upekṣeta//(p.353)
GS39kamasutu:1795: 6.6.8/.saṃdigdhāyāṃ tu phala^prāptau syād vā na vā^iti śuddha^saṃśayaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1800: 6.6.13/.yasya^uttamasya^abhigamane pratyakṣato +artha^lābho grahaṇīyatvam āyatir āgamaḥ prārthanīyatvaṃ ca^anyeṣāṃ syāt so +artho +artha^anubandhaḥ//(p.354)
GS39kamasutu:1801: 6.6.14/.lābha^mātre kasya cid anyasya gamanaṃ so +artho niranubandhaḥ//(p.354)
GS39kamasutu:1802: 6.6.15/.anya^artha^parigrahe saktād āyati^cchedanam arthasya niṣkramaṇaṃ loka^vidviṣṭasya vā nīcasya gamanam āyatighnam artho +anartha^anubandhaḥ//(p.354)
GS39kamasutu:1803_0: 6.6.16 /.(svena vyayena śūrasya mahāmātrasya prabhavato vā lubdhasya gamanaṃ niṣphalam
GS39kamasutu:1803_1: api vyasana^pratīkāra^arthaṃ mahataś ca^arthaghnasya nimittasya praśamanam āyati^jananaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1804: 6.6.17/.kadaryasya subhaga^māninaḥ kṛtaghnasya vā^atisaṃdhāna^śīlasya svair api vyayais tathā^ārādhanam ante niṣphalaṃ so +anartho niranubandhaḥ//(p.355)
GS39kamasutu:1805: 6.6.18/.tasya^eva rāja^vallabhasya kraurya^prabhāva^adhikasya tathā^eva^ārādhanam ante niṣphalaṃ niṣkāsanaṃ ca doṣa^karaṃ so +anartho +anartha^anubandhaḥ//(p.355)
GS39kamasutu:1809: 6.6.22/.niṣpīḍita^artham aphalam utsṛjantyā artham alabhamānāyā dharmaḥ syān na vā^iti dharma^saṃśayaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1810: 6.6.23/.abhipretam upalabhya paricārakam anyaṃ vā kṣudraṃ gatvā kāmaḥ syān na vā^iti kāma^saṃśayaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1812: 6.6.25/.atyanta^niṣphalaḥ saktaḥ parityaktaḥ pitṛ^lokaṃ yāyāt tatra^adharmaḥ syān na vā^ity adharma^saṃśayaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1813: 6.6.26/.rāgasya^api vivakṣāyām abhipretam anupalabhya virāgaḥ/ syān na vā^iti dveṣa^saṃśayaḥ/ iti śuddha^saṃśayāḥ//(p.356)
GS39kamasutu:1815: 6.6.28/.āgantor avidita^śīlasya vallabha^saṃśrayasya prabhaviṣṇor vā samupasthitasya^ārādhanam artho +anartha iti saṃśayaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1816: 6.6.29/.śrotriyasya brahmacāriṇo dīkṣitasya vratino liṅgino vā māṃ dṛṣṭvā jāta^rāgasya mumūrṣor mitra^vākyād ānṛśaṃsyāc ca gamanaṃ dharmo +adharma iti saṃśayaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1817: 6.6.30/.lokād eva^ākṛta^pratyayād aguṇo guṇavān vā^ity anavekṣya gamanaṃ kāmo dveṣa iti saṃśayaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1819: 6.6.32/.yatra parasya^abhigamane +arthaḥ saktāc ca saṃgharṣataḥ sa ubhayayo +arthaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1820: 6.6.33/.yatra svena vyayena niṣphalam abhigamanaṃ saktāc ca^amarṣitād vitta^pratyādānaṃ sa ubhayato +anarthaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1821: 6.6.34/.yatra^abhigamane +artho bhaviṣyati na vā^ity āśaṅkā sakto +api saṃgharṣād dāsyati na vā^iti sa ubhayato +artha^saṃśayaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1822_0: 6.6.35 /.yatra^abhigamane vyayavati pūrvo viruddhaḥ krodhād apakāraṃ kariṣyati na
GS39kamasutu:1822_1: vā^iti sakto vāmarṣito dattaṃ pratyādāsyati na vā^iti sa ubhayato +anarthasaṃśayaḥ /
GS39kamasutu:1825: 6.6.38/.yatra^abhigamane niṣphalo vyayo +anabhigamane ca niṣpratī^kāro +anarthaḥ sa ubhayato +anarthaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1826: 6.6.39/.yatra^abhigamane nirvyayo dāsyati na vā^iti saṃśayo +anabhigamane sakto dāsyati na vā^iti sa ubhayato +artha^saṃśayaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1827_0: 6.6.40 /.yatra^abhigamane vyayavati pūrvo viruddhaḥ prabhāvavān prāpsyate na vā^iti
GS39kamasutu:1827_1: saṃśayo +anabhigamane ca krodhād anarthaṃ kariṣyati na vā^iti sa ubhayato +anartha^saṃśayaḥ //(p.359)
GS39kamasutu:1831: 6.6.42/.teṣu sahāyaiḥ saha vimṛśya yato +artha^bhūyiṣṭho +artha^saṃśayo gurur anartha^praśamo vā tataḥ pravarteta//(p.360)
GS39kamasutu:1832: 6.6.43/.evaṃ dharma^kāmav apy anayā^eva yuktyā^udāharet/ saṃkirec ca paraspareṇa vyatiṣañjayec ca^ity ubhayato^yogāḥ//(p.360)
GS39kamasutu:1833: 6.6.44/.saṃbhūya ca viṭāḥ parigṛhṇanty ekām asau goṣṭhī^parigrahaḥ/
